item.g:title: Bangle Bracelet
item.g:description: <p>Gold bangle bracelet with studded jewels.</p><p>A bracelet is <strong>an article of jewellery that is worn around the wrist</strong>. Bracelets may serve different uses, such as being worn as an ornament. When worn as ornaments, bracelets may have a supportive function to hold other items of decoration, such as charms.</p><p><br> </p>

item.g:title: Hera Cot Mattress
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Ships within 1 week of purchase
    2. Peach touch microfibre fabric is anti-microbial, hypoallergenic and softly quilted for a plump and comfy sleep surface
    3. A tight fit between fibres helps aid longevity and allows the fabric to keep it's shape and colour over time
    4. Multiple high tensile pocket springs encapsulated in nursery grade foam provide responsive comfort and optimal body support
    5. The adaptive springs react to your baby’s movement and growth; providing targeted support for the perfect level of comfort
    6. The zip off cover is quick drying and machine washable at 40° to help keep your mattress clean and dry at all times
    7. Tightly woven fibres help repel stains
    8. The adjustable inner membrane provides a waterproof layer of protection for the core
    9. Features a breathable microfibre fabric cover and an open cell nursery foam core to maintain an ideal sleeping climate
    10. Fully certified to BS EN 16890, BS 7177:2008+A1:2011
    11. Suitable for use in the Hera Complete Sleep in Maxi Cot / Toddler Bed / First Bed modes

  • The Hera Mattress is a breathable, microfibre, pocket-sprung mattress suitable for your Hera Complete Sleep. The multiple high tensile pocket springs encapsulated in nursery grade foam provide responsive comfort and optimal body support.

    While the adaptive springs provide targeted support based on your baby's movement and growth, the open cell nursery foam core helps maintain an ideal sleeping climate.

    Quilted for a plump and comfy sleep surface, the mattress is anti-microbial and hypoallergenic. Machine washable at 40°, wipeable, water-resistant & certified latest BS & EN safety standards.

  • Dimensions: L:120cm W:60cm H:10cm

    Product Weight: 3.4kg

    Warranty: 1 year warranty as standard.

    For use with: Hera Complete Sleep in Maxi Cot, Toddler Bed, First Bed modes

    Delivery Options: Standard Delivery £12.50 (Free on orders over £50)

item.g:title: Leto Changing Pad & Cover
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Ships within 2 weeks of purchase
    2. Premium quality nursery grade foam changing pad ensuring optimum comfort
    3. Changing pad with waterproof layer designed to perfectly fit the changing top of your Leto Dresser / Changer
    4. Removable, quick-drying cotton cover; machine washable at 60°C
    5. Elasticated cover to fit snug & secure to the Leto Changing Pad

  • The Leto Changing Pad and Cover are designed specifically for use in the Leto Dresser/Changer.

    The changing pad is made of premium quality nursery grade foam ensuring optimum comfort and is a perfect fit for the Leto Dresser/Changer. The changing pad features a waterproof layer making it easy to wipe & clean the surface.

    The finest quality pure cotton is used to create a soft, breathable cover. Contoured to custom fit the Leto Changing Pad, suitable for machine washing and tumble drying.

  • Dimensions: L:84cm W:42cm H:5cm

    Product Weight: 1kg

    Warranty: 1 year warranty as standard.

    For use with: Leto Dresser

    Delivery Options: Standard Delivery £7.50 (Free on orders over £100)

item.g:title: Leto Spring Mattress
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Open Coil Spring Mattress Structure with breathable Supportive baby safe fibre and Breathable temperature controlled cover
    2. Machine washable cover at 60 deg. Zip off cover. Natural Anti-Allergy treatment
    3. Made in the UK. Two year guarantee
    4. Complies with BS1877 Part 10 2011+ A1:2012. Complies with the European Safety Standard for Cot mattresses: EN16890

  • Our Leto mattress is designed to provide comfort and support for baby. Support is provided by responsive springs and the outer cover is soft and breathable allowing for free air flow whilst keeping baby cool helping to regulate heat.

    The outer sleeping surface is removable for washing at 60 deg C to kill germs and bacteria. It is also treated with Actipro which acts as an anti allergy barrier helping those who suffer with allergies

  • Dimensions: L: 140.5 cm W: 70 cm H: 10.5 cm

    Product Weight: 7.4kg

    Warranty: 1 year warranty as standard.

    For use with: Leto Complete Sleep

    Delivery Options: Standard Delivery £7.50 (Free on orders over £100)

item.g:title: Hera Junior Bed Extension
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Ships within 1 week of purchase
    2. Convert your Hera cot to a Junior bed for children up to 7 years.
    3. More sustainable: Reuse parts and components from your cot to extend use up to 7 years.
    4. Beautifully contoured ergonomic design means no sharp edges and corners.
    5. Made from sustainably sourced Ash wood, ethically manufactured and 100% recyclable.
    6. Sleep surface is close to the ground so safe and secure for younger children.
    7. Robust and strong to withstand rest & play. Tested to the highest standards and fully certified to BS8509 (child bed).
    8. Extends the bed from 124cm to 164cm.

  • Extend your Gaia Baby Hera First Bed to a Junior Bed for kids up to 7 years. Made from sustainably sourced real Ash wood, the Hera Complete Sleep is beautifully designed with soft contours and smooth flowing lines.

    Certified to the highest global safety standards, Gaia Baby products are sustainably sourced, ethically manufactured and made to last the test of time. All in all, simply beautiful parenting!

  • Dimensions: L:164.4cm W:64.4cm H:46.9cm

    Product Weight: 8kg

    Warranty: 2 yrs warranty as standard. Register your purchase to avail of our 3 year extended warranty.

    For use with: Hera Junior Bed Extension Mattress sold separately (coming soon).

    Delivery Options: Standard Delivery £7.50 (Free on orders over £100)

We will refund any Shipping charges paid for this order against future purchases from Gaia Baby.


Contact us for details.

item.g:title: Serena Cot Bed Modular Mattress
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Ships within 1 week of purchase
    2. Luxury pocket sprung, modular mattress
    3. Featuring Purotex technology which uses active probiotics that help reduce reduce the amount of house dust mite allergens by 93.7%
    4. Individual high tensile pocket springs encapsulated in nursery grade foam provide responsive comfort and optimal body support
    5. Zip off cover - Quick drying and machine washable at 40° wipeable and water resistant to help keep your mattress clean and dry at all times
    6. The adaptive technology treats the textile with a temperature sensitive polymer and provides a dynamic response
    7. 117 x 7cm springs give your baby maximum support and comfort
    8. Springs are encapsulated in nursery grade foam providing responsive comfort and optimal body support
    9. Split into 3 pieces; Adaptable to use in Mini Cot, Maxi Cot & Junior Bed mode
    10. Fully certified to BS EN 16890, BS 7177:2008+A1:2011 & SI 316/1995

  • This Gaia mattress is designed/sized to work in perfect harmony with your Gaia Serena Complete Sleep cot bed. This fully pocket sprung mattress adapts in size to fit the cot in both Mini Cot and Maxi Cot sizes. Made in the UK, this mattress is made to the highest quality ensuring your baby is safe and sound and adheres to the highest safety standards.

    Featuring Purotex technology which uses active probiotics to reduce the amount of house dust mite allergens by 93.7% two weeks after application creating a fresh and clean sleeping environment. It's adaptive technology ensures the temperature sensitive polymer provides a dynamic response.

    The adaptive springs react to your baby’s movement and growth; providing targeted support for the perfect level of comfort.

  • Dimensions: L:93.5-136cm W:66cm H:10cm

item.g:title: Hera Co-sleep Crib Natural Ash / Walnut & Storage Box Conversion Kit
item.g:description:
Product Information:

﻿Ships within 3 weeks of purchase
Sleep is of the essence for us at Gaia Baby. With the Hera Crib, it’s built in. 
In this beautifully crafted real wood crib, with your baby close and secure, you will find easy and simple settings & adjustments to customize your Hera crib so that you and your baby sleep better, for longer.    
The Hera Co-Sleep Crib is specially designed to provide a safe, secure, and comfortable nights’ sleep for you and your baby. Safety certified to the highest global standards, this beautifully crafted crib is made from natural Ash, sustainably grown in the USA. Its gently curved ends in natural tones highlight the real grain of this eco-friendly wood. With stunning A-frame accents, its generous size makes it the perfect choice for a baby's first sleep space. 
The Hera Crib is part of the Hera Family Collection available in Scandi White / Natural Ash or Natural Ash / Walnut with the choice of coordinating Cot / Dresser / Wardrobe, Changing Station & accessories.
This purchase includes the Hera Co-Sleeping Crib and the Hera Co-Sleeping Crib Storage Boxes.

This is a demonstration store. You can purchase products like this from United By Blue.

The base of the seat is made from our classic navy blue organic cotton canvas, the same we use in products such as our Foraker Coat,  that is used to make the back of the chair, and detailed with a United By Blue woven patch. This stool is part of a collaboration United By Blue has with heritage outdoor furniture maker Blue Ridge Chair Works.

item.g:title: Pennsylvania Notebooks
item.g:description:
This is a demonstration store. You can purchase products like this from United By Blue.

These Pennsylvania themed notebooks are part of the "County Fair Edition" Field Notes. With this 3-Pack, we pay homage to United By Blue's home state of PA.  The colors of the notebooks are the colors of 1st, 2nd and 3rd place County Fair ribbons; blue, red and yellow. They’re printed on 100-lb. linen cover stock and all three feature metallic gold printing and 48 pages of blank graph paper with light blue/grey lines inside. The back covers feature a bevy of meticulously-researched state facts and figures.

  • 3-1/2” wide by 5-1/2” tall

item.g:title: Red Wing Iron Ranger Boot
item.g:description:
This is a demonstration store. You can purchase products like this from United By Blue.

The Mesabi Iron Range lies in northern Minnesota, a rugged and remote area known for its iron mines. The local residents who work these mines are proudly known as Iron Rangers, individuals with a sense of adventure and a determined personality. Originally designed to be worn in the iron mines, Iron Ranger work boots had to be as tough as the people who wore them in demanding conditions. Iron Ranger boots are built with a double layer of leaver over the toe to provide an extra measure of safety.

  • 6 inch, Amber Harness leather with Nitrile Cork sole.

item.g:title: Adult Pink Chunky Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Your wish is our command! Finally we have brought out our very own grown up dungarees!
 
For years, our customers have been asking us to make dungarees for them, not just their children, and they are finally here! This tiny capsule collection has all the hallmark dotty features and is perfect for parents who want to twin with their little ones, or anyone looking for the elusive perfect pair! Everyone needs a retro pair of dungarees, the comfiest clothes for life on the move and so versatile, from pregnancy and breast-feeding, to racing around with toddlers and tweens!

All dungarees are not made equal. And as with everything Dotty ours have a couple of key ingredients: classic cuts, a generous fit and made of the SOFTEST fabric out there. Our chunky corduroy dungarees are the comfiest item in our own wardrobes and will be in yours too! 

Stock is very limited, so grab yours while they last...

item.g:description:
If you've got lots of Godchildren or Grandchildren then this is the bundle for you. Mix and match our organic Breton Tops with our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees. And voila! 

Plus you get a whopping £44 discount!

Happy shopping!

item.g:title: Arizona Pink Shorts
item.g:description:
The softest summer shorts in our bestselling brushed denim, these adorable new additions to the Dotty Dungarees summer collection come in Arizona Pink, Sky Blue, Olive Green and Yellow. 

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and bespoke buttons, as well as the most adorable dotty turn up.

All Dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining. The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane. They are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Atlantic Blue Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. This year's collection includes all your old favourites - Navy, Ochre, Old Rose Pink, Bright Red, Ochre and Moss - as well as the brighter Hot Pink and Atlantic Blue. We have also added a new wintry palette of Charcoal, Robin Red, Nordic Blue and Mint. 

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining and are machine washable with similar colours up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Baseball Tee - Blue
item.g:description:
These super soft cotton tops are a retro addition to any Dotty Dungarees outfit. They come in 5 colours which you can mix and match with any of our dungarees and dresses.

We are very conscious of sustainability in all our products which is why we only ever make styles which don't go out of fashion and are excellent quality so that they can be passed down to siblings and friends.

item.g:title: Arizona Pink Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!
 

Our super duper soft brushed denims have become an instant classic at Dotty Dungarees. This season, they are back in Arizona Pink, Cloud Grey, Cornflower Blue and Emerald Green. 

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, turn-ups to make them truly last a full year and bespoke buttons. They are also the only dungarees on the market with zip access for quick and easy nappy changes (up to 24m).

Lined in 100% combed cotton jersey, our brushed denim range are the perfect choice for those slightly cooler Spring months. The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane. They are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Arizona Pink Dress
item.g:description:
You've got to feel it to believe it! Our Arizona Pink denim dress is unbelievably soft inside and out. 
 
With all our special Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last, matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y) and our 100% combed cotton dotty jersey lining.

item.g:title: Baseball Tee - Green
item.g:description: These super soft, organic cotton tops are a retro addition to any Dotty Dungarees outfit. They come in Pink, Yellow, Green, Red and Blue - which you can mix and match with any of our dungarees or dresses.

item.g:title: Baseball Tee - Khaki
item.g:description:
These super soft cotton tops are a retro addition to any Dotty Dungarees outfit. They come in 5 colours which you can mix and match with any of our dungarees and dresses.

We are very conscious of sustainability in all our products which is why we only ever make styles which don't go out of fashion and are excellent quality so that they can be passed down to siblings and friends.

item.g:title: Baseball Tee Short Sleeve - Green
item.g:description:
NEW!

Upgrade your wardrobe with this fun take on a classic style! Our Baseball Tee Short Sleeve - Green is made of ultra-soft and comfy 100% cotton material and has an easy fit. Plus, its timeless design will keep you looking stylish for years to come. It's an essential for any laid-back look!

item.g:title: Baseball Tee Short Sleeve - Red
item.g:description: This short-sleeved baseball tee is the ultimate way to relax in style! Crafted from 100% soft cotton for an ultra-comfy fit, it's the perfect blend of retro cool and modern practicality. Whether you're grilling out or taking it easy on the couch, this relaxed fit tee will have you feeling comfy-cozy!

item.g:title: Baseball Tee Short Sleeve - Yellow
item.g:description: This baseball tee is the perfect combo of soft and timelessly cool - like a hug from a good friend! Crafted with 100% cotton, it's light, breezy, and fun. Wear it on any day when you want to show off your laid-back, fun-loving style!

item.g:title: Blue Dotty Dress
item.g:description:
NEW!

Diddy Dottys are for the tiniest of adventurers, made of 100% combed cotton jersey, these super soft dresses come in our signature dotty fabric. They are accessorized with wooden buttons and matching knickers and packaged in an adorable Diddy Dotty cotton pouch. 

For the perfect gift, pair with a super soft Diddy Dotty vest.

item.g:title: Blue Breton Stripe Top
item.g:description:
We think we've created the perfect long sleeved t-shirt! Our Breton tops are a hit with our customers big and small. Made from the softest cotton jersey with woven stripes in a range of colours, they have poppers on the shoulders to avoid any fuss when changing and keep even the most intrepid explorers cosy and warm! Available in Blue, Navy, Red, Ochre, Pink, Green and Purple Stripes.
 
Pop it on underneath a pair of Dotty Dungarees and you're all set for adventure.

item.g:title: Blue Dotty Dungarees
item.g:description:
Diddy Dottys are for the tiniest of adventurers, made of 100% combed cotton jersey, these super soft rompers come in our signature dotty fabric. They are accessorized with wooden buttons and packaged in an adorable Diddy Dotty cotton pouch. 

For the perfect gift, pair with a super soft Diddy Dotty vest.

item.g:title: Blue Seersucker Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our bestselling seersuckers are FINALLY back in stock! These were so popular last year, we sold out in a week... So make sure you bag your pair early!

Available in Rainbow and Blue stripes, these adorable seersucker shorts and dresses are 100% cotton with bespoke buttons and buckles. A summer must-have!

item.g:title: Blue Seersucker Dress
item.g:description:
LAST CHANCE TO BUY!

Blue stripe seersucker summer dress with matching blue lining...

  • Adjustable straps 
  • Lightweight seersucker fabric with 100% combed cotton jersey lining around bib and straps
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m)
  • All dresses come with matching 100% combed cotton jersey knickers (up to 2-3y)

item.g:title: Blue Stripe Summer T-Shirt
item.g:description:
Our bestselling Summer Stripe Tees are back and are now made of organic cotton. They are available in Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green and Grey stripes. The classic shape comes with a distinctive solid stripe around the neckline and is perfect under any of the Dotty Dungarees collection of dresses, shorts or full length dungers.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane, making them quick and easy to slip over little heads.

item.g:title: Brick Red Corduroy Dress
item.g:description: Our best-selling winter cord dresses are back, in a range of seasonal colours. Made from the softest needlepoint cord with our signature 100% cotton jersey lining and with matching knickers up to 2-3y, they are the perfect winter choice for blustery outdoor adventures as well as cosy fireside days. Dresses available in Old Rose Pink, Brick Red, Ochre, Vintage Plum and Bright Red.

item.g:title: Brick Red Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling winter cord are back in beautiful new winter colours: Ochre, Mint, Robin Red, Brick Red, Vintage Plum, Charcoal Grey and Nordic Blue. 

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining and are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Baseball Tee Short Sleeve - Blue
item.g:description: This Baseball Tee Short Sleeve is perfect for all your casual adventures, offering timeless style and unbeatable comfort in one go. Crafted with 100% cotton, it's super soft and oh-so cozy - fit for any day of fun that comes your way!

item.g:title: Bumper Bundle of Blues
item.g:description: All the blues! Two mix and match outfits featuring our super popular Lightning Print Nordic Dungarees and the classic Navy Cord Dungarees, this baby blue bundle is the perfect gift.

item.g:title: Camouflage Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
Years of experience both in motherhood and fashion has taught us never to underestimate the power of the camouflage! We have learnt that it will forever be in style. These dungarees are sure to bring out the inner explorer of your little one, setting them up for adventure and wonder in the world around them. Exclusively designed for the daring and the brave.

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. They wouldn’t be Dotty Dungarees of course without the easily adjustable straps and generous turn ups allowing them to be passed down to siblings or handed to friends (we know all too well how fast those little ones grow!) Made from the softest cord, with our signature 100% cotton-jersey lining, our bespoke dotty buttons and zip access for those all-important speedy changes. (up to age 18-24m).

Sustainability is at the very heart of everything we do. That's why these dungers have been designed with durability in mind and can withstand whatever mischief is thrown at them.

item.g:title: Camouflage Cord Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our best-selling printed cord range is back, with beautiful new prints. Made for daring adventures and top secret missions of all kinds, our Camouflage Cord Overall Shorts are guaranteed to be a hit with the little ones as well as the tweens...

Our super soft corduroy shorts have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is made of cotton with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!

item.g:title: Caramel Corduroy Dress
item.g:description:
Our winter cord dresses are back in our most popular seasonal colours: Old Rose Pink, Bright Red, Caramel and beautifully cool Mint! These timeless dresses are a total classic and look perfect with the Peter Pan or Margaux Ruffle collar tops.

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and adorable matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y). Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages.

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining.

item.g:title: Caramel Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling winter cord are back in all your favourite colours: Navy, Old Rose Pink, Brick Red, Caramel, Moss Green, Vintage Plum and Bright Red... as well as the brand new Hot Pink, Grass Green and Atlantic Blue.

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey.

item.g:title: Caramel Linen Dress
item.g:description:
NEW!

Brand new style, brand new fabric. Adorable criss cross straps creating a beautiful silhouette, our all new linen dresses come with matching dotty knickers (upto 2-3y) and bespoke button detail.

item.g:title: Cloud Grey Denim Dress
item.g:description:
Super soft cloud grey stretch denim dress with our signature Dotty grey lining.

  • Adjustable straps 
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m)
  • All dresses come with matching 100% combed cotton jersey knickers (up to 2-3y)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Caramel Linen Shorts
item.g:description: Linen knee length shorts in our classic dungarees style. With bespoke Dotty details in the buttons and buckles. Super soft fabric with an adorable crumple.

item.g:title: Charcoal Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling winter cord are back in beautiful new winter colours: Ochre, Mint, Robin Red, Brick Red, Vintage Plum, Charcoal Grey and Nordic Blue. 

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining and are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Cloud Grey Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
Cloud grey stretch denim dungarees with our signature Dotty grey lining.

  • Adjustable straps and turn-ups
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m) 
  • Zip access allows for quick and easy nappy changes (3m-24m)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Cobalt Blue Cotton Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

100% cotton unisex summer shorts which are timeless in shape and style. You simply can't go wrong! Available in Crimson, Cobalt Blue and Pebble.

item.g:title: Cloud Grey Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!
 

Our super duper soft brushed denims have become an instant classic at Dotty Dungarees. This season, they are back in Cloud Grey, Red, Cornflower Blue and Emerald Green. 

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, turn-ups to make them truly last a full year and bespoke buttons. They are also the only dungarees on the market with zip access for quick and easy nappy changes (up to 24m).

Lined in 100% combed cotton jersey, our brushed denim range are the perfect choice for those slightly cooler Spring months. The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane. They are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Corduroy Dungaree Dress (Navy Blue)
item.g:description:
Super soft needlepoint corduroy dungaree dress in navy blue with a matching Dotty lining. 

  • Adjustable straps 
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m) 
  • With matching Dotty jersey knickers (up to 2-3y)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Cornflower Blue Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!
 

Our super duper soft brushed denims have become an instant classic at Dotty Dungarees. This season, they are back in Cloud Grey, Red, Cornflower Blue and Emerald Green. 

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, turn-ups to make them truly last a full year and bespoke buttons. They are also the only dungarees on the market with zip access for quick and easy nappy changes (up to 24m).

Lined in 100% combed cotton jersey, our brushed denim range are the perfect choice for those slightly cooler Spring months. The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane. They are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Cream Pink Heart Print Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
Here at Dotty HQ we (whole heartedly) believe that every childhood should contain a permanent sprinkling of love, adventure and love of adventure. This ethos is perfectly captured in our new heart printed dungaree collection. Join us in spreading the love with these adorable dungaree sets.

Our recipe is for love is simple. Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) and a design for all occasions.

They wouldn’t be Dotty Dungarees of course without the easily adjustable straps and generous turn ups allowing them to be passed down to siblings or handed to friends.  Sustainability is at the very heart of everything we do and these beauties have been designed with durability in mind and the ability to withstand whatever mischief they are put through.

item.g:title: Cream Pink Heart Cord Shorts
item.g:description:
We are a little bit in love with this Love Heart collection! 

Our first Heart Print dungarees were a total sell out last season and are back again this year in our classic red heart on pink, as well as two new styles: Cream Corduroy with Pink Hearts and Purple Corduroy with Black Hearts.

Our super soft needlepoint cord is made of cotton with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend.

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining and are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Cream Pink Heart Print Dress
item.g:description:
You asked and we listened… that’s right…we are back with our classic love heart cords. Love bomb your little ones with these classic dotty staples. Another heart-warming colourway to add to our love collection. We would really love a pair in all three variations! Spreading the love is something we take pride in at Dotty Dungarees and what better way to do it than with these love heart printed cords.

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. And with matching knickers... what's not to love?!

item.g:title: Crimson Cotton Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

100% cotton unisex summer shorts. Timeless in shape and style. You simply can't go wrong! Available in Crimson, Cobalt Blue and Pebble.

item.g:title: DDxAO Overall Dress - Floral Express
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE

The prettiest pinafore dresses in bright seasonal prints: Floral Express and Ditsy. Alice + Olivia’s bespoke prints look adorable on these classic dresses which come in Dotty’s signature super soft fabrics, with matching knickers.

They are perfect teamed with a matching Peter Pan collar top for the sweetest Spring Summer look!

Find the matching styles on Alice + Olivia. 

Ships from the US so may take up to 5 working days for delivery.

item.g:title: DDxAO Overall Dress - Ditsy
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE

The prettiest pinafore dresses in bright seasonal prints: Floral Express and Ditsy. Alice + Olivia’s bespoke prints look adorable on these classic dresses which come in Dotty’s signature super soft fabrics, with matching knickers.

They are perfect teamed with a matching Peter Pan collar top for the sweetest Spring Summer look!

item.g:title: DDxAO Overall Shorts - Antique Butterfly
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE

The sweetest of shorts in beautiful floral prints: Antique Butterfly and Drifting By. Alice + Olivia’s bespoke prints could not look cuter on these classic overall shorts, with the option of a little turn up on the leg.

They are perfect teamed with a matching Peter Pan collar top for the sweetest Spring Summer look!

Find the matching styles on Alice + Olivia. 

Ships from the US so may take up to 5 working days for delivery.

item.g:title: DDxAO Overall Shorts - Stace Face
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE
 
The ICONIC Stace Face print on classic Dotty Dungarees overalls, shorts and Peter Pan tops... We could not love these more! Super cool, super retro, this amazing print looks absolutely adorable on Dotty's timeless overalls, shorts and tops. These will never go out of style!
 
This print is THE classic Alice + Olivia print, relaunched to mark the 20th anniversary of this iconic brand and its even more iconic founder! Dotty Dungarees overalls are made of the very softest fabrics and have tons of unique Dotty features - adjustable straps and turn-ups (so they can be worn a full year), zip opening between the legs (for the very littlest full length overalls… up to 24m) and bespoke brass buttons and buckles. So they are practical, as well as sweet!
 
The Stace Face collection is the perfect Mommy & Me outfit from toddlers to tweens.
 
Find the matching styles on Alice + Olivia. 
 
Ships from the US so may take up to 5 working days for delivery.

item.g:title: DDxAO Overall Shorts - Drifting By
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE

The sweetest of shorts in beautiful floral prints: Antique Butterfly and Drifting By. Alice + Olivia’s bespoke prints could not look cuter on these classic overall shorts, with the option of a little turn up on the leg.

item.g:title: DDxAO Peter Pan Collar - Antique Butterfly
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE

What could be more classic than a Peter pan collar top? These beautifully cut, super soft, 100% cotton tops are an all-time favourite with Dotty Dungarees customers and look absolutely adorable with the Alice + Olivia signature prints. They are the perfect match to any of the Dotty x A+O collection and also are super sweet as a stand alone, spring summer piece. They have little gathered sleeves and bespoke mother of pearl buttons at the back.

We guarantee this will be the first of many Peter Pan tops in your children’s wardrobes!

Find the matching styles on Alice + Olivia. 

Ships from the US so may take up to 5 working days for delivery.

item.g:title: DDxNH Ditsy Floral Summer Dress
item.g:description:
EXCLUSIVE COLLABORATION WITH NICKY HILTON

Inspired by her own two girls, Nicky's capsule is full of cute florals and pretty pastels. Choose from Ditsy Floral and Plain Lilac, Nicky's dresses are designed with style and comfort in mind. The super soft outer fabric together with 100% combed cotton jersey linings make them a super popular choice for your little Princess!

They also feature the little heart pockets for hiding treasures and bespoke matching cat buttons and buckles. As with all Dotty Dungarees, Nicky's dresses come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and matching knickers (to age 2-3y)! Irresistibly cute!!

Ships from USA in approx. 1 week.

item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE

What could be more classic than a Peter pan collar top? item.g:title: DDxNH Lilac Summer Dress
item.g:description:
EXCLUSIVE COLLABORATION WITH NICKY HILTON

Inspired by her own two girls, Nicky's capsule is full of cute florals and pretty pastels. With a choice of Ditsy Floral and Plain Lilac, Nicky's dresses are designed with style and comfort in mind. The super soft outer fabric together with 100% combed cotton jersey linings make them a super popular choice for your little Princess!

They also feature the little heart pockets for hiding treasures, bespoke matching cat buttons and buckles and a pretty crochet trim at the hem. As with all Dotty Dungarees, Nicky's dresses come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and matching knickers (to age 2-3y)! Irresistibly cute!!

Ships from USA in approx. 1 week.

item.g:title: DDxNH Pink Heart Dungarees
item.g:description:
EXCLUSIVE COLLABORATION WITH NICKY HILTON

Inspired by her own two girls, Nicky's capsule is full of cute florals and pretty pinks. These super soft pink dungarees feature little heart pockets for hiding treasures and bespoke pink cat buttons and buckles. They are lined in the softest 100% combed cotton jersey with a ditsy floral design. Simply perfect for the sunny days ahead! 

As with all Dotty Dungarees, these cuties come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and generous turn-ups to make them last a full year. And they have our unique zip opening between the legs for the fastest and easiest of diaper changes (up to 24m).

Ships from USA in approx. 1 week.

item.g:description:

  • Adjustable straps 
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m)
  • All dresses come with matching 100% combed cotton jersey knickers (up to 2-3y)

item.g:description:
EXCLUSIVE COLLABORATION WITH NICKY HILTON

Inspired by her own two girls, Nicky's capsule is full of cute florals and pretty pastels. These adorable overall shorts come in a Ditsy Floral and Plain Pink with a ditsy floral lining. Designed with style and comfort in mind, the soft outer fabric together with 100% combed cotton jersey linings make them a super popular choice for your little Princess!

They also feature the little heart pockets for hiding treasures and bespoke matching cat buttons and buckles. Perfect for Summer adventures!

Ships from USA in approx. 1 week.

item.g:title: Dotty Denim Dress
item.g:description:

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and adorable matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y).

item.g:title: Dotty Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling Dotty Denim Dungarees are back in stock! These summer must-haves are both classic and comfy. Lined in the softest, 100% combed cotton pink jersey, they are super summery yet warm enough for chillier days. They are perfect when paired an Edie Frill top or a simple summer tee and one of our all-time customer favourites. 

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year. And they have our unique zip opening between the legs for the fastest and easiest of nappy changes (up to 24m).

item.g:title: Edie Frill Top - Powder Blue
item.g:description: The Edie Frill Top is a classic summer tee, perfect paired with any of our dungaree collection. It is 100% cotton, has the sweetest frill detail and bespoke buttons at the back. Available in Blush Pink, Powder Blue and White.

item.g:title: Edie Frill Top - White
item.g:description: This Edie Frill Top is perfect for everyday wear. Crafted from 100% cotton for superior comfort, it features a classic silhouette with beautiful frill sleeves for a timeless, pretty look. The Edie Frill Top is the perfect timeless piece for any wardrobe.

item.g:title: Edie Frill Top - Blush Pink
item.g:description: The Edie Frill Top is a classic summer tee, perfect paired with any of our dungaree collection. It is 100% cotton, has the sweetest frill detail and bespok buttons at the back. Available in Blush Pink, Powder Blue and White.

item.g:title: Emerald Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!

Judging by how popular last season's Emerald Shorts were, these are sure to be a hit with little girls and boys up and down the country! Made from our super duper soft brushed denim these Spring dungarees are unbelievably soft inside and out.

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, turn-ups to make them truly last a full year and bespoke buttons. They are also the only dungarees on the market with zip access for quick and easy nappy changes (up to 24m).

Lined in 100% combed cotton jersey, our brushed denim range are the perfect choice for those slightly cooler Spring months. The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane.

item.g:title: Emerald Green Denim Shorts
item.g:description: The softest summer shorts in our bestselling brushed denim, these adorable new additions to the Dotty Dungarees summer collection come in the brightest, unisex green. Running slightly longer in the leg, this fabric looks adorable on both boys and girls.

item.g:title: Floral Mint Shorts
item.g:description:
Take your look to the next level with the Floral Mint Shorts. They feature a timeless design with soft pastel colours, pretty flowers and spring vibes. Crafted with super soft fabric, these shorts are perfect for your next outdoor adventure. 

Made of our trademark super soft brushed denim they are as sweet as they are practical with all the usual dotty features. As with all Dotty Dungarees clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups make them last for at least a year and can be passed down to siblings and for generations to come.

They are perfect paired with any of our summer tees and perfect for summer adventures at home or abroad!

item.g:title: Floral Lilac Shorts
item.g:description:
These Floral Lilac Shorts feature classic spring flowers on a timeless, pretty background. Crafted out of super soft fabric, they are sure to be a wardrobe staple for seasons to come.

Made of our trademark super soft brushed denim they are as sweet as they are practical with all the usual dotty features. As with all Dotty Dungarees clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups make them last for at least a year and can be passed down to siblings and for generations to come.

They are perfect paired with any of our summer tees and perfect for summer adventures at home or abroad!

item.g:title: Emerald Green Denim Girls Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!!

The perfect superbly soft summer shorts. Available in Arizona Pink and Emerald Green. These girls version are lined in our bespoke Dotty jersey and feature little Dotty turn ups.

item.g:title: Floral Pink Shorts
item.g:description:
Take your look to the next level with the Floral Pink Shorts. They feature a timeless design with soft pastel colours, pretty flowers and spring vibes. Crafted with super soft fabric, these shorts are perfect for your next outdoor adventure. 

Made of our trademark super soft brushed denim they are as sweet as they are practical with all the usual dotty features. As with all Dotty Dungarees clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups make them last for at least a year and can be passed down to siblings and for generations to come.

item.g:title: Gift Card
item.g:description:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Dotty Dungarees gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout.

item.g:title: Green Corduroy Dungarees - Black Spot
item.g:description:
NEW!

Part of our brand new printed corduroy range, these black spotted green cord dungarees are sure to be a firm favourite for boys and girls alike. 

Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

Our printed corduroy range includes Heart, Green with Black Spots, Navy with Red Spots and Nordic Blue with Lightning.

item.g:title: Green Stripe Summer T-Shirt
item.g:description:
Our bestselling Summer Stripe Tees are back and are now made of organic cotton! They are available in Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green and Grey stripes. The classic shape comes with a distinctive solid stripe around the neckline and is perfect under any of the Dotty Dungarees collection of dresses, shorts or full length dungers.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane, making them quick and easy to slip over little heads.

item.g:title: Green Denim Shorts
item.g:description: These Green Denim Shorts are the classic retro style you know and love! With bright colours that fill your wardrobe with sunshine, they're the perfect wardrobe staple for any adventure. Super soft and comfy, they'll become your new fave in no time! Go ahead, treat yourself!

item.g:title: Grass Green Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW! 

Our best-selling winter cord are back in all your favourite colours: Navy, Old Rose Pink, Brick Red, Moss Green, Vintage Plum and Bright Red... as well as the brand new Hot Pink, Grass Green, Caramel and Atlantic Blue.

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey.

item.g:title: Green Acorn Printed Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Children love to find treasures and the Acorn Cord Dungarees are the perfect outfit for Autumn foraging and forest walks. The pretty acorn print is a nod to the mighty oak into which all our little acorn customers will grow!

Our super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend.

item.g:title: Green Breton Stripe Top
item.g:description:
Our Breton Tops have fast become one of our best sellers.

Made from the softest cotton jersey mix (92% cotton, 8% elastane), they have poppers on the shoulders to avoid any fuss when changing and keep even the most intrepid explorers cosy and warm!

This seasons colours include Mint, Nordic Blue, Robin Red, Navy, Red, Ochre, Pink and Green.

They are the perfect accessory to our dungaree and dress collection and can be mixed and matched with any of our winter colours.

item.g:title: Grey Dotty Dress
item.g:description:
Diddy Dottys are for the tiniest of adventurers, made of 100% combed cotton jersey, these super soft dungaree dresses come in our signature dotty fabric. They are accessorized with wooden buttons and matching knickers and packaged in an adorable cotton pouch. 

For the perfect gift, pair with a super soft Diddy Dotty vest.

item.g:title: Grey Dotty Dungarees
item.g:description:
Diddy Dottys are for the tiniest of adventurers, made of 100% combed cotton jersey, these super soft rompers come in our signature dotty fabric. They are accessorized with wooden buttons and packaged in an adorable cotton pouch. 

For the perfect gift, pair with a super soft Diddy Dotty vest.

item.g:title: Gift Box
item.g:description: To make your present extra special why not package it all up in one of our Dolly and Otto Gift Boxes.

item.g:title: Heart Print Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
You asked and we listened… that’s right…we are back with our classic love heart cords. Love bomb your little ones with these classic dotty staples. Another heart-warming colourway to add to our love collection. We would really love a pair in all three variations! Spreading the love is something we take pride in at Dotty Dungarees and what better way to do it than with these love heart printed cords.

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. They wouldn’t be Dotty Dungarees of course without the easily adjustable straps and generous turn ups allowing them to be passed down to siblings or handed to friends as sustainability is at the very heart of everything we do.

This pair comes with all the bells and whistles including adjustable straps and turn-ups making them super sustainable to really stand the test of time (we know all too well how fast those little ones grow!) Made in comfy cord with our signature 100% cotton-jersey lining, our bespoke dotty buttons and zip access for those all-important speedy changes. (up to age 18-24m).

item.g:title: Hot Pink Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!

Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. This year's collection includes all your old favourites - Navy, Ochre, Old Rose Pink, Bright Red, Ochre and Moss. We have also added a new wintry palette of Charcoal, Robin Red, Nordic Blue, Lilac and Mint.

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey and are machine washable with similar colours up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Ice Blue Snowflake Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling printed brushed denim range is back in our best-selling snowflake print. Inspired by the queen of frost and snow, these beautiful Snowflake Dungarees flew off the shelves with little girls of all ages last year, and are perfect styled with a Peter Pan snowflake top for the complete look. 

They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

item.g:title: Heart Print Corduroy Dress
item.g:description:
You asked and we listened… that’s right…we are back with our classic love heart cords. Love bomb your little ones with these classic dotty staples. Another heart-warming colourway to add to our love collection. We would really love a pair in all three variations! Spreading the love is something we take pride in at Dotty Dungarees and what better way to do it than with these love heart printed cords.

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. And with matching knickers... what's not to love?!

item.g:title: Ink Blue Dress
item.g:description:
You've got to feel it to believe it! Available in Olive Green and Ink Blue, our brushed denim dresses are unbelievably soft inside and out. You wont want to stop stroking them! 
 
With all our special Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last, matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y) and our 100% combed cotton dotty jersey lining.

item.g:title: Ink Blue Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our super soft brushed denims are back in a limited number of styles. Available in Olive Green and Ink Blue, these classic dungarees are unbelievably soft inside and out and are completely unisex. They work perfectly either styled with a more feminine Peter Pan or Margaux top, or any of our Breton colours.

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, as well as our unique zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane.

AND... Due to popular demand these are now available up to a size 6-7y!

item.g:description:

These super soft t-shirts are 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane, making them quick and easy to slip over little heads.

item.g:description: Linen knee length shorts in our classic dungarees style. With bespoke Dotty details in the buttons and buckles. Super soft fabric with an adorable crumple.

item.g:title: Khaki Chunky Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our cord collection has been a long-time favourite of our customers so this season we are expanding the range with BRAND NEW chunky cords in all our best selling seasonal colours. They are everything you love about our classic cords... with a twist! 

Our super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is made of cotton with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!

item.g:title: Leopard Print Dungarees
item.g:description:
Dressing up with style has never been easier. Do you remember having a piece of clothing that you never wanted to take off? We boldly claim that these will be that irresistible item. Prefect for those lazy winter days at home where your children can enter the jungle or African Savannah from your playroom. Give them the chance to let their imagination run wild... 

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. They wouldn’t be Dotty Dungarees of course without the easily adjustable straps and generous turn ups allowing them to be passed down to siblings or handed to friends (we know all too well how fast those little ones grow!) Made from soft brushed denim, with our signature 100% cotton-jersey lining, our bespoke dotty buttons and zip access for those all-important speedy changes. (up to age 18-24m).

Sustainability is at the very heart of everything we do. That's why these beauties have been designed with durability in mind and can withstand whatever mischief is thrown at them.

item.g:title: Leopard Print Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

Leopard print was one of last year's best selling prints and is back this year in the sweetest shorts! This fabric is so super soft, you have to feel it to believe it, so these are not only a favourite print but also the softest items in any child's wardrobe!

As always with Dotty, there are all the features that make Dotty so special - not only the softest fabrics but bespoke buttons, adjustable straps and a super classic cut that stands the test of time and trend.

Pair with a Peter Pan Top and be set for parties or adventures this Fall/Winter!

item.g:title: Lilac Bundle
item.g:description:
We are Dotty about lilac! Here's your chance to save over 15% on our Lilac bundle deal. 

Combine our best-selling super soft Lilac Corduroy Dungarees and Dress with one of our adorable 100% organic cotton Peter Pan Collar Tops. Perfect for matchy matchy or Christmas gifting. 

And you save more than £20.

What's not to love?!

item.g:title: Lilac Corduroy Dress
item.g:description:
NEW!

We are dotty about Lilac!

Our best-selling winter cord dresses are back, in a range of seasonal colours. Made from the softest needlepoint cord with Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons, signature 100% cotton jersey lining and adorable matching knickers up to 2-3y, they are the perfect winter choice for blustery outdoor adventures as well as cosy fireside days.

These timeless dresses are a total classic and look perfect with the Peter Pan or Breton tops.

Corduroy dresses are available in Heart Print, Navy with Red Spots, Old Rose Pink, Mint, Ochre, Red and Lilac.

item.g:title: Lilac Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
We are dotty about Lilac!! 

Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. 

They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is made of cotton with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

item.g:title: Lilac Denim Dress
item.g:description:
ICE CREAM

Super soft lilac denim dress with is the sweetest addition to our Ice Cream collection.

It comes with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and adorable matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y). As always, it is lined in 100% combed cotton dotty jersey and is machine washable up to 30 degrees.

Wholesale Price: GBP £19.50 | Euro €27 | USD $30 (Euro and USD are landed prices, inc tax and shipping)

item.g:title: Lilac Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
Feeling the urge for some denim daydreams? Slip into our Lilac Denim Dungarees for a fun, soft, and adventure-ready experience! Crafted from the softest denim and lined in 100% cotton jersey, you'll find yourself getting ready for a stylish expedition!

Available in mint, lilac, sunshine and sky, they are fully lined and super comfortable, made of the softest denim and lined in 100% combed cotton so there are no seams to irritate little legs. This also makes them ideal for all seasons, worn with no tops and turned up in the warmer summer months or with layers in the autumn and winter.

As with all our clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups mean they can be worn for at least a year and they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Lilac Frill Shorts
item.g:description:
These frill shorts are a girly twist on our classic ice cream shorts. Made of our trademark super soft brushed denim they are as sweet as they are practical with all the usual dotty features! Distinctive yet classic, these shorts are ideal for long summer days outside, adventures and expeditions.

As with all Dotty Dungarees clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups make them last for at least a year and can be passed down to siblings and for generations to come.

They are perfect paired with any of our summer tees.

item.g:title: Love Heart Shorts
item.g:description:
Our first ever printed summer shorts come in the prettiest pink heart print. These adorable dungarees are made of the softest brushed denim with a little frill.

They are a feminine take on our classic style and are guaranteed to be as popular with parents as they are with little ones! 

Perfect paired either with a Peter Pan, Edie frill or Jack summer top, this is a must have in any little girl's summer wardrobe. As with all Dotty Dungarees clothes, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Margaux Ruffle Neck - Dove
item.g:description:
Adorable ruffle collar tops in the softest organic 100% cotton, these new additions to the Dotty collection are the perfect accessory for any little girl in search of adventures.
 

It is all in the details… Three beautifully finished ruffles at the neck, loosely gathered at the wrists, three ‘dotty’ wooden buttons at the back and a loose fit make this top both adorable and supremely comfy to put on as well as wear. Available in White, Dove Grey, Blush Pink and Powder Blue. Team it with our needlepoint cords for the perfect winter look.

item.g:description:
Adorable ruffle collar tops in the softest organic 100% cotton, these new additions to the Dotty collection are the perfect accessory for any little girl in search of adventures.
 
It is all in the details… Three beautifully finished ruffles at the neck, loosely gathered at the wrists, three ‘dotty’ wooden buttons at the back and a loose fit make this top both adorable and supremely comfy to put on as well as wear. Available in White, Dove Grey, Blush Pink and Powder Blue. Team it with our needlepoint cords for the perfect winter look.

item.g:description:
Adorable ruffle collar tops in the softest organic 100% cotton, these new additions to the Dotty collection are the perfect accessory for any little girl in search of adventures.
 
It is all in the details… Three beautifully finished ruffles at the neck, loosely gathered at the wrists, three ‘dotty’ wooden buttons at the back and a loose fit make this top both adorable and supremely comfy to put on as well as wear. item.g:title: Margaux Ruffle Neck - White
item.g:description:
Adorable ruffle collar tops in the softest organic 100% cotton, these new additions to the Dotty collection are the perfect accessory for any little girl in search of adventures.

It is all in the details… Three beautifully finished ruffles at the neck, loosely gathered at the wrists and a loose fit make this top both adorable and supremely comfy to put on as well as wear. And due to popular demand we now make the White Margaux up to a size 6-7y!

item.g:title: Maxi Top - Blue Stripe
item.g:description:
Super sweet and a little old fashioned our Maxi tops are the perfect unisex top for all of our AW22 styles. Just as good for outdoor adventures as Sunday best, this style is super versatile and a long-term part of the Dotty top collection.

We are very conscious of sustainability in all our products which is why we only ever make styles which don't go out of fashion and are excellent quality so that they can be passed down to siblings and friends.

item.g:title: Maxi Top - Chalk Blue
item.g:description:
Our Maxi Tops are made for all adventurers. This classic cut has our signature buttons at the neck and is as adorable for winter ramblings as Sunday best. Made from 100% organic cotton jersey and with bespoke Dotty buttons at the cuffs, they are super comfy.
 
Available in White, Chalk Blue and Sand.

item.g:title: Maxi Top - Grey Stripe
item.g:description:
Super sweet and a little old fashioned our Maxi tops are the perfect unisex top for all of our AW22 styles. Just as good for outdoor adventures as Sunday best, this style is super versatile and a long-term part of the Dotty top collection.

We are very conscious of sustainability in all our products which is why we only ever make styles which don't go out of fashion and are excellent quality so that they can be passed down to siblings and friends.

NEW!!

Made from 100% cotton jersey and with bespoke Dotty buttons at the cuffs, they are super comfy. Available in White, Charcoal Stripe, Chalk Blue and Sand.

item.g:title: Love Heart Dungarees
item.g:description:
Cuddle up in our cosy Love Heart Dungarees! These pastel perfection dungarees, with a fun love heart design, will be sure to make you look pretty as a picture. Plus, they're super soft!

They are a feminine take on our classic style and are guaranteed to be as popular with parents as they are with little ones.

Perfect paired either with a Peter Pan, Edie frill or Jack summer top, this is a must have in any little girl's summer wardrobe. As with all Dotty Dungaree clothes, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Midnight Blue Denim Dress
item.g:description:
Super soft midnight blue stretch denim dress with our signature Dotty blue lining.

  • Adjustable straps 
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m)
  • All dresses come with matching 100% combed cotton jersey knickers (up to 2-3y)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Mint Cord Dress
item.g:description:
Our best-selling winter cord dresses are back, in a range of seasonal colours. Made from the softest needlepoint cord with Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons, signature 100% cotton jersey lining and adorable matching knickers up to 2-3y, they are the perfect winter choice for blustery outdoor adventures as well as cosy fireside days. 

These timeless dresses are a total classic and look perfect with the Peter Pan or Breton tops.

Corduroy dresses are available in Heart Print, Navy with Red Spots, Old Rose Pink, Mint, Ochre, Red and Lilac.

item.g:title: Midnight Blue Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
Midnight blue stretch denim dungarees with our signature Dotty blue lining.

  • Adjustable straps and turn-ups
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m) 
  • Zip access allows for quick and easy nappy changes (3m-24m)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Mint Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. 

They are back in beautiful winter colours: Ochre, Mint, Robin Red, Old Rose Pink, Lilac, Nordic Blue, Navy, Red, Moss Green and our brand new printed corduroy range: Heart, Green with Black Spots, Navy with Red Spots and Nordic Blue with Lightning. 

They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

item.g:title: Mint Breton Stripe Top
item.g:description:
Our Organic Breton tops have fast become one of our best sellers and are back in stock for AW21.

Made from the softest organic cotton jersey mix (92% cotton, 8% elastane), they have poppers on the shoulders to avoid any fuss when changing and keep even the most intrepid explorers cosy and warm!

This seasons colours include Mint, Nordic Blue, Robin Red, Navy, Red, Ochre, Pink and Green.

They are the perfect accessory to our dungaree and dress collection and can be mixed and matched with any of our winter colours.

item.g:title: Mint Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
Stay cool and stylish in these Mint Denim Dungarees. These super soft, retro dungarees are so comfy you'll never want to take them off! Select from a range of beautiful colours (including, of course, mint!) and have a fashionable blast! Slip into something seriously comfy!

Available in mint, lilac, sunshine and sky, they are fully lined and super comfortable, made of the softest denim and lined in 100% combed cotton so there are no seams to irritate little legs. This also makes them ideal for all seasons, worn with no tops and turned up in the warmer summer months or with layers in the autumn and winter.

As with all our clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups mean they can be worn for at least a year and they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Mint Frill Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!!

These frill shorts are a girly twist on our classic ice cream shorts. Made of our trademark super soft brushed denim they are as sweet as they are practical with all the usual dotty features! Distinctive yet classic, these shorts are ideal for long summer days outside, adventures and expeditions.

As with all Dotty Dungarees clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups make them last for at least a year and can be passed down to siblings and for generations to come.

They are perfect paired with any of our organic summer tees.

item.g:description:

Our cord collection has been a long-time favourite of our customers so this season we are expanding the range with BRAND NEW chunky cords in all our best selling seasonal colours. They are everything you love about our classic cords... with a twist! 

Our super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!

item.g:title: Olive Green Dress
item.g:description:
You've got to feel it to believe it! Available in Olive Green and Ink Blue, our brand new brushed denim dresses are unbelievably soft inside and out. You won't want to stop stroking them! 
 
With all our special Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last, matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y) and our 100% combed cotton dotty jersey lining.

item.g:title: Old Rose Pink Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. 

They are back in beautiful winter colours: Ochre, Mint, Robin Red, Old Rose Pink, Lilac, Nordic Blue, Navy, Red, Moss Green and our brand new printed corduroy range: Heart, Green with Black Spots, Navy with Red Spots and Nordic Blue with Lightning.

item.g:title: Otto Stripe Dungarees
item.g:description:
DOTTY CLASSIC

Otto Stripe Dungarees are the perfect choice for fashion lovers looking for timeless style that's also comfy and durable. Their classic butcher stripe design ensures you'll stand out from the crowd, while their super soft fabric ensures maximum comfort. Enjoy classic style and comfort with Otto Stripe Dungarees!

Summer wouldn’t be summer without some classic striped dungarees! Inspired by memories of our own childhood but updated with unique Dotty features, the Otto Stripe is an all time classic. Super soft blue butcher stripe dungarees with our signature 100% combed cotton jersey Dotty lining and zip access for easy nappy changing.

Unisex design and made to withstand every adventure (...psst stains miraculously don't show up on the stripes!). Timeless in style and designed to last from generation to generation.

item.g:title: Olive Green Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our super soft brushed denims are back in a limited number of styles. Available in Olive Green and Ink Blue, these classic dungarees are unbelievably soft inside and out and are completely unisex. They work perfectly either styled with a more feminine Peter Pan or Margaux top, or any of our Breton colours.

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, as well as our unique zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane.

AND... Due to popular demand these are now available up to a size 6-7y!

item.g:title: Pale Blue Diddy Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!

Diddy Dottys are for the tiniest of adventurers, made of 100% combed cotton jersey, these super soft rompers come in our signature dotty fabric. They are accessorized with wooden buttons and packaged in an adorable Diddy Dotty cotton pouch. 

For the perfect gift, pair with a super soft Diddy Dotty vest.

item.g:title: Olive Green Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!!

The softest summer shorts in our bestselling brushed denim, these adorable new additions to the Dotty Dungarees summer collection come in Olive Green, Yellow and Cornflower Blue. Their classic shape and muted colours make them completely unisex.
 
They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and bespoke buttons. The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane.

item.g:title: Otto Stripe Dress
item.g:description:
DOTTY CLASSIC

Our super soft blue butcher stripe dress with signature Dotty lining is the perfect Spring time classic for your little adventurer.

It comes with all the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and adorable matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y).

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining.

item.g:description:
DOTTY CLASSIC

Timeless in both shape and style these classics are unisex and will be treasured from sibling to sibling and down the generations.

item.g:description:
Our super soft pale blue stripe denim dungarees are back with our signature Dotty blue lining. Probably the softest stripes we've ever made, these adorable summer dungarees are fully lined so will work just as well turned up on a hot summer day as it will in the chillier springtime weather. 

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year.

As with all Dotty Dungarees, they are fully lined in a 100% combed cotton lining.

item.g:title: Pale Denim Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

There are three new styles: thick stripe shorts, faded stonewash dress with unicorn lining and faded stonewash shorts.

They are a summery take on our classic denim collection, they never go out of style, and can be worn as they are or paired with any of our organic tops.

item.g:description:
NEW!

They are a summery take on our classic denim collection, they never go out of style, and can be worn as they are or paired with any of our tops.

item.g:title: Pastel Colourblock Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE!

These full-length retro dungarees feature a bold pastel colourblock design, perfect for making a statement. Crafted from super soft fabric, these dungarees are a fun and comfortable way to rock the '90s trend.

They are not only super sweet but really good for the planet too as they use off cuts of our ice cream collection. Win win!

item.g:description:

  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m)

item.g:title: Patchwork Floral Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW & EXCLUSIVE!

What can we say? These are patchwork perfection! A mix match of our Floral Printed shorts to create a limited edition beauty. 

These Patchwork Floral Shorts are the perfect way to make a fun and flirty statement! With playful patchwork and blooming spring flowers, you'll love the super soft fabric and sweet style! Get ready to turn heads - these trendy shorts are sure to be a hit.

item.g:title: Pastel Patchwork Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our Pastel and Primary Patchwork Dungarees are the pinnacle of perfect. Where rustic meets chic. Here at Dotty HQ we hate to see waste. Perhaps the most satisfying element of these (besides the beautiful finish) is that they are made up of off cut fabric from our other cord designs. Waste not want not has never been truer!

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. They wouldn’t be Dotty Dungarees of course without the easily adjustable straps and generous turn ups allowing them to be passed down to siblings or handed to friends.

Sustainability is at the very heart of everything we do and our patchworks are no exception. They have been designed with durability in mind and can withstand whatever mischief is thrown at them.

item.g:title: Pale Grey Stripe Shorts
item.g:description:

  • Adjustable straps
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m) 

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Pastel Colourblock Denim Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

These best selling colourblock denim shorts offer a unique sense of style and comfort. Crafted with a super soft, denim fabric, they feature a happiness-inducing palette of bright, fun colours, sure to make any outfit pop. Perfect for a modern, retro-inspired look.

Made of the softest denims, they are both quirky and timeless. The pastel comes in a slightly more fitted cut, and is shorter in the leg, and the primary is a looser fit.

item.g:title: Pale Grey Stripe Dungarees
item.g:description:

  • Adjustable straps and turn-ups
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m) 
  • Zip access allows for quick and easy nappy changes (3m-24m)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.
