Super sweet and a little old fashioned our Peter Pan Collar long sleeved top is an adorable addition to the Dotty family. Made from 100% organic cotton and available in Gold Spot, Pink Spot, Grey Spot, Plain White and brand new Lilac and Mint Hearts.

Perfect for special occasions and Sunday best!

item.g:description:

Super sweet and a little old fashioned our Peter Pan Collar long sleeved top is an adorable addition to the Dotty family. They are available in Pink Spot, Plain White, Pink Heart and Snowflake! Perfect for special occasions and Sunday best!

We are very conscious of sustainability in all our products which is why we only ever make styles which don't go out of fashion and are excellent quality so that they can be passed down to siblings and friends.

item.g:description: 100% cotton unisex summer shorts. Timeless in shape and style. You simply cant go wrong! Available in Crimson, Cobalt Blue and Pebble.

item.g:description:
NEW!

Super simple 100% combed cotton jersey vest with a Peter Pan collar. The perfect addition to your Diddy Dotty outfit.

Pair with some Diddy Dottys for the ideal baby gift.

item.g:title: Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt - Floral
item.g:description:
Our short sleeved Peter Pan Collar tees are the sweetest addition to any dotty adventurer's wardrobe. Available in White, Pink Floral, Purple Floral, Pink Hearts and Pink Spots.

These super soft t-shirts are 100% cotton making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt - Purple Flower
item.g:description:
Our short sleeved Peter Pan Collar tees are the sweetest addition to any dotty adventurer's wardrobe. Available in White, Pink Floral, Purple Floral, Pink Hearts and Pink Spots.

These super soft t-shirts are 100% cotton making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt - Pink Hearts
item.g:description:
NEW!

This Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt features a timeless design with a sweet collar and classic pink hearts that make it the perfect choice for a Sunday best. Crafted from 100% cotton, this shirt is lightweight and comfortable.

These super soft t-shirts are 100% cotton making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Petrol Blue Chunky Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our cord collection has been a long-time favourite of our customers so this season we are expanding the range with BRAND NEW chunky cords in all our best selling seasonal colours. They are everything you love about our classic cords... with a twist! 

Our super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is made of cotton with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!

item.g:title: Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt - Yellow Spot
item.g:description:
Our brand new short sleeved Peter Pan Collar tees are the sweetest addition to any dotty adventurer's wardrobe. Available in a looser fitting Floral and Yellow Spot plus a tighter Plain White and Pink Spot. 

These super soft t-shirts are 100% organic cotton making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt - White
item.g:description:
This Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt is crafted from the finest 100% cotton and features sunday best style pearl buttons. Its super sweet design and softest fabrics make this T-Shirt the perfect way to look and feel your best.

Available in White, Pink Floral, Purple Floral, Pink Hearts and Pink Spots.

These super soft t-shirts are 100% cotton making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Pink Breton Stripe Top
item.g:description:
Our Organic Breton tops have fast become one of our best sellers and are back in stock for AW21.

Made from the softest organic cotton jersey mix (92% cotton, 8% elastane), they have poppers on the shoulders to avoid any fuss when changing and keep even the most intrepid explorers cosy and warm!

This seasons colours include Mint, Nordic Blue, Robin Red, Navy, Red, Ochre, Pink and Green.

They are the perfect accessory to our dungaree and dress collection and can be mixed and matched with any of our winter colours.

item.g:title: Pink Chunky Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our cord collection has been a long-time favourite of our customers so this season we are expanding the range with BRAND NEW chunky cords in all our best selling seasonal colours. They are everything you love about our classic cords... with a twist! 

Our super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is made of cotton with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!

item.g:title: Pink Cord Shorts
item.g:description: The perfect winter shorts are now here! Made from our super soft needlepoint cord and featuring our signature 100% combed cotton jersey linings, these shorts are available in Red, Green, Gold, Navy and Pink and make the most adorable little outfits when paired with a Peter Pan collar. Delicious.

item.g:title: Pink Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
ICE CREAM DENIMS

Brand new for SS21, these coloured denim dungarees are super soft and super retro!

Available in mint, lilac, emerald, pink and sky blue, they are fully lined and super comfortable, made of the softest denim and lined in 100% combed cotton so there are no seams to irritate little legs. This also makes them ideal for all seasons, worn with no tops and turned up in the warmer summer months or with layers in the autumn and winter.

As with all our clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups mean they can be worn for at least a year and they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Pink Diddy Dungarees
item.g:description:
New for your tiny adventurers our Diddy Dottys are 100% cotton super soft Diddy Dotty jersey dungaree romper with wooden button detail and poppers for easy nappy access. For the perfect gift, pop it over one of our cotton vests.

Perfectly packaged in our bespoke 100% cotton Diddy Dotty pouches.

item.g:title: Pink Denim Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!!

Our ice cream denim collection is available in both full length dungarees and these adorable shorts.

Made of the softest, most comfortable stonewashed denims, this classic retro collection is nostalgic through and through, with timeless shapes and washed out pastel summer colours. They have stepped right off the page of faded family photos from the 1970s, vintage camping trips or lazy summer days at the beach with children seeking the same adventures and simple pleasures now as they did then.

Available in a more fitted feminine cut in pink and yellow, as well as a looser classic cut in red and blue.

item.g:title: Pink Linen Dress
item.g:description: Brand new style, brand new fabric. Adorable criss cross straps creating a beautiful silhouette, our all new linen dresses come with matching dotty knickers (upto 2-3y) and bespoke button detail.

item.g:title: Pink Frill Shorts
item.g:description:
These frill shorts are a girly twist on our classic ice cream shorts. Made of our trademark super soft brushed denim they are as sweet as they are practical with all the usual dotty features! Distinctive yet classic, these shorts are ideal for long summer days outside, adventures and expeditions.

As with all Dotty Dungarees clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups make them last for at least a year and can be passed down to siblings and for generations to come.

item.g:title: Pink Dotty Dress
item.g:description:
New for your tiny adventurers our Diddy Dottys are made from super soft 100% cotton jersey. This pink dotty dress comes with wooden buttons and matching dotty knickers. For the perfect gift, pair with a super soft Diddy vest.

Beautifully packaged in one of our bespoke 100% cotton Diddy Dotty pouches.

item.g:title: Pink Dotty Dungarees
item.g:description:
Diddy Dottys are for the tiniest of adventurers, made of 100% combed cotton jersey, these super soft dungaree dress come in our signature dotty fabric. They are accessorized with wooden buttons and matching knickers and packaged in an adorable cotton pouch. 

For the perfect gift, pair with a super soft Diddy Dotty vest.

item.g:title: Pink Stripe Dress
item.g:description:
DOTTY CLASSIC

This pink butcher stripe dress offers timeless fashion that won't go out of style, with a classic design and SUPER SOFT fabric. Its unique pattern makes it a subtle and sophisticated statement piece for any wardrobe.

It comes with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and adorable matching jersey knickers. As always, it is lined in 100% combed cotton dotty jersey.

item.g:title: Pink Diddy Dress
item.g:description:
New for your tiny adventurers our Diddy Dottys are made from super soft 100% cotton jersey. This pink dotty dress comes with wooden buttons and matching dotty knickers. For the perfect gift, pair with a super Diddy soft vest.

Beautifully packaged in one of our bespoke 100% cotton Diddy Dotty pouches.

item.g:title: Peter Pan Short Sleeved T-Shirt - Pink Spot
item.g:description:
Available in White, Pink Floral, Purple Floral, Pink Hearts and Pink Spots.

These super soft t-shirts are 100% cotton making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Pink Stripe Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our Pink Stripe Shorts are the perfect combination of comfort and style. Super soft fabric and pretty in pink stripes let you stand out in the crowd. Feel cute and confident no matter where you go!

Timeless in both shape and style, they are designed to sit above the knee with little pink dotty turn ups and 100% combed cotton jersey lining. Irresistibly cute!

item.g:title: Pink Stripe Dungarees
item.g:description:
DOTTY CLASSIC

Be the coolest cat on the street this summer with Pink Stripe Dungarees! These classic dungarees are super soft, so you can wear them all day long while you travel on your wildest adventures. Plus, the butcher stripe pattern looks super sweet, so you’ll be the envy of all your beach-bound buddies. Get ready to rock your summer days with Pink Stripe Dungarees!

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year. And they have our unique zip opening between the legs for the fastest and easiest of nappy changes (up to 24m). 

Our dungarees are a classic cut and made in the softest fabrics inside and out. All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining.

item.g:title: Plum Corduroy Dungarees - Grey Spot
item.g:description:
NEW!

We are so excited about our Brand new printed corduroy range! Available in a variety of colourways including Navy with Red Spots, Navy with Green Spots, Plum with Grey Spots, Moss with Black Spots and Nordic with Lightning Bolts. Plus the super sweet Pink Heart Dresses and Dungarees.

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining and are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Primary Colourblock Denim Shorts
item.g:description:
These Primary Colourblock Denim Shorts will turn any routine into a fun adventure! With these super soft shorts, you'll be sure to make a bold statement while being happy as a clam. So get ready to brighten your wardrobe and your day with style!

Made from the offcuts of our main collection and all in the softest denims, they are both quirky and timeless. The pastel comes in a slightly more fitted cut, and is shorter in the leg, and the primary is a looser fit.

item.g:title: Pretty in Pink
item.g:description:
If your little one loves all things pink then this is the outfit combo for you...

Combine our organic Pink Baseball Top, Pink Spot Peter Pan and a pair of our super soft Old Rose Pink Corduroy Dungarees for the perfectest pinkest outfit!

item.g:title: Primary Colourblock Dungarees
item.g:description:
Be bold in style and comfort with the Primary Colourblock Dungarees. Crafted from a soft and lightweight cotton blend fabric, these dungarees feature block colouring for an eye-catching retro-90's look. You'll be sure to make a statement with their bright and cheerful colour palette.

They are not only super sweet but really good for the planet too as they use off cuts of our ice cream collection. Win win!

item.g:title: Pink Stripe Summer T-Shirt
item.g:description:
Our bestselling Summer Stripe Tees are back and are now made of organic cotton! They are available in Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green and Grey stripes. The classic shape comes with a distinctive solid stripe around the neckline and is perfect under any of the Dotty Dungarees collection of dresses, shorts or full length dungers.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% organic cotton and 5% elastane, making them quick and easy to slip over little heads.

item.g:title: Polar Bear Print Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

﻿Who can resist these super cute Polar Bear all over print dungarees?! Made from our super soft brushed denim - you really have to feel it to believe it! - our Polar Bear Dungarees are the perfect choice for little explorers all over! 

Our super soft brushed denim dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend.

item.g:title: Purple Black Heart Printed Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our mission to spread the love is officially underway with the launch of our new Love Heart Collection. Love with a twist. After such a runaway success last year we decided that our collection would be incomplete without these beauties, but this time luxury and glamour were at the forefront of our designs. In these dungarees purple and black come together create a mystical and marvellous pair for discovering the love of adventure. 

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. They wouldn’t be Dotty Dungarees of course without the easily adjustable straps and generous turn ups allowing them to be passed down to siblings or handed to friends. 

Sustainability is at the very heart of everything we do, that's why these beauties have been designed with durability in mind and can withstand whatever mischief is thrown at them.

item.g:title: Primary Patchwork Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our Pastel and Primary Patchwork Dungarees are the pinnacle of perfect. Where rustic meets chic. Here at Dotty HQ we hate to see waste. Perhaps the most satisfying element of these (besides the beautiful finish) is that they are made up of off cut fabric from our other cord designs. Waste not want not has never been truer!

Super soft cotton needlepoint cord, a little bit of elastane (to accommodate for that all-important stretch) leaves your child comfortable and happy in their adventure ready gear. They wouldn’t be Dotty Dungarees of course without the easily adjustable straps and generous turn ups allowing them to be passed down to siblings or handed to friends.

Sustainability is at the very heart of everything we do and our patchworks are no exception. They have been designed with durability in mind and can withstand whatever mischief is thrown at them.

item.g:title: Red Corduroy Dress
item.g:description:
Our best-selling winter cord dresses are back, in a range of seasonal colours. Made from the softest needlepoint cord with Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons, signature 100% cotton jersey lining and adorable matching knickers, they are the perfect winter choice for blustery outdoor adventures as well as cosy fireside days. 

These timeless dresses are a total classic and look perfect with the Peter Pan or Breton tops.

item.g:title: Rainbow Seersucker Dress
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our bestselling seersuckers are FINALLY back in stock! These were so popular last year, we sold out in a week... So make sure you bag your pair early!

Available in Rainbow and Blue stripes, these adorable seersucker shorts and dresses are 100% cotton with bespoke buttons and buckles. A summer must-have!

item.g:title: Rainbow Seersucker Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our bestselling seersuckers are FINALLY back in stock! These were so popular last year, we sold out in a week... So make sure you bag your pair early!

Available in Rainbow and Blue stripes, these adorable seersucker shorts and dresses are 100% cotton with bespoke buttons and buckles. A summer must-have!

item.g:title: Rainbow Bundle
item.g:description:
Nothing but Good Vibes this Christmas! Shop our Rainbow Bundle for your daily does of happiness... Our Good Vibes Denim Dungarees, a Rainbow Denim Dress and a Sunshine Yellow Baseball Tee are sure to brighten up your day! 

Oh and we didn't even mention the £40 discount!

item.g:title: Red Breton Stripe Top
item.g:description:
Our Organic Breton tops have fast become one of our best sellers and are back in stock for AW21.

Made from the softest organic cotton jersey mix (92% cotton, 8% elastane), they have poppers on the shoulders to avoid any fuss when changing and keep even the most intrepid explorers cosy and warm!

This seasons colours include Mint, Nordic Blue, Robin Red, Navy, Red, Ochre, Pink and Green.

They are the perfect accessory to our dungaree and dress collection and can be mixed and matched with any of our winter colours.

item.g:title: Purple Breton Stripe Top
item.g:description:
We think we've created the perfect long sleeved t-shirt! Our Breton tops are a hit with our customers big and small. Made from the softest cotton jersey with woven stripes in a range of colours, they have poppers on the shoulders to avoid any fuss when changing and keep even the most intrepid explorers cosy and warm! Available in Blue, Navy, Red, Ochre, Pink, Green and Purple Stripes.
 
Pop it on underneath a pair of Dotty Dungarees and you're all set for adventure.

item.g:description: Returning to the Dotty wardrobe are our gorgeous winter shorts. Made from our super soft needlepoint cord and featuring our signature 100% combed cotton jersey linings, these shorts are available in Red, Green, Gold, Navy and Pink and make the most adorable little outfits when paired with a Peter Pan collar or a Breton Stripe. Delicious.

item.g:description:

item.g:title: Rainbow Stripe Summer T-Shirt
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our bestselling Summer Stripe Tees are back and are now made of organic cotton! This season they are in the ever popular blue stripe, as well as the brand new rainbow stripe. The classic shape comes with a distinctive solid stripe around the neckline and is perfect under any of the Dotty Dungarees collection of dresses, shorts or full length dungers.

These super soft t-shirts are 100% organic cotton and as always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Red Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!
 
Put a Spring in your step with our rainbow dungaree collection... red, yellow, pink, green, blue and grey... Our new brushed denim dungarees are super soft inside and out.
 
They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip openings between the legs (up to 24m).

item.g:title: Red Denim Dress
item.g:description:
NEW!!
 

Part of our rainbow of summer colours, these adorable red denim dresses are super comfy inside and out.

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and adorable matching jersey knickers (up to 2-3y).

item.g:title: Red Stripe Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Super soft red stripe denim dungarees with 100% combed cotton jersey red lining. Probably the softest stripes we've ever made, these adorable summer dungarees are fully lined so will work just as well turned up on a hot summer day as it will in the chillier springtime weather. 

They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year. They have our unique zip opening between the legs for the fastest and easiest of nappy changes (up to 24m).

item.g:title: Robin Red Chunky Cord Dress
item.g:description:

Our cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!

Dresses are available in Old Rose Pink, Ochre and Bright Red, as well as Chunky Cord - Robin.

item.g:title: Red Seersucker Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our bestselling seersuckers are finally back in stock in the sweetest of summer colours! Made from 100% cotton fabric, they come in blue, red and… rainbow stripe!

These classic dungaree shorts will brighten any wardrobe! They are the perfect outfit for summer days, wondering barefoot on the beach or with wellies for the wetter weather. item.g:title: Red Seersucker Dress

NEW!!

item.g:title: Red Denim Shorts
item.g:description:

Our ice cream denim collection is available in both full length dungarees and these adorable shorts.

Made of the softest, most comfortable stonewashed denims, this classic retro collection is nostalgic through and through, with timeless shapes and washed out pastel summer colours. They have stepped right off the page of faded family photos from the 1970s, vintage camping trips or lazy summer days at the beach with children seeking the same adventures and simple pleasures now as they did then.

Available in a more fitted feminine cut in pink and yellow, as well as a looser classic cut in red and blue.

item.g:title: Round Neck Vest
item.g:description:
﻿NEW!

Super simple 100% combed cotton jersey vest with a round neck. The perfect addition to your Diddy Dotty outfit.

Pair with some Diddy Dottys for the ideal baby gift.

item.g:title: Robin Red Breton Stripe Top
item.g:description:
Our Breton Tops have fast become one of our best sellers.

Made from the softest organic cotton jersey mix (92% cotton, 8% elastane), they have poppers on the shoulders to avoid any fuss when changing and keep even the most intrepid explorers cosy and warm!

This seasons colours include Mint, Nordic Blue, Robin Red, Navy, Red, Ochre, Pink and Green.

They are the perfect accessory to our dungaree and dress collection and can be mixed and matched with any of our winter colours.

item.g:title: Red Stripe Shorts
item.g:description:
Super soft red stripe denim dungaree shorts with our signature Dotty red lining.

  • Adjustable straps
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m) 

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Robin Red Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. 

They are back in beautiful winter colours: Ochre, Mint, Robin Red, Old Rose Pink, Lilac, Nordic Blue, Navy, Red, Moss Green and our brand new printed corduroy range: Heart, Green with Black Spots, Navy with Red Spots and Nordic Blue with Lightning. 

They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

item.g:title: Seagrass Linen Dress
item.g:description: Brand new style, brand new fabric. Adorable criss cross straps creating a beautiful silhouette, our all new linen dresses come with matching dotty knickers (upto 2-3y) and bespoke button detail.

item.g:title: Seagrass Linen Shorts
item.g:description: Brand new 100% linen knee length shorts in our classic dungarees style. With bespoke Dotty details in the buttons and buckles. Super soft fabric with an adorable crumple.

item.g:title: Sky Blue Denim Dress
item.g:description:
Super soft sky blue stretch denim dress with our signature Dotty blue lining.

  • Adjustable straps 
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m)
  • All dresses come with matching 100% combed cotton jersey knickers (up to 2-3y)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Sky Blue Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our Sky Blue Dungarees are the perfect addition to any wardrobe! Crafted from super soft, brushed baby blue denim, these classic dungarees are perfect for warmer summer days. Enjoy a comfortable fit with a beautiful shade of blue that's ideal for brightening up your wardrobe.

Available in mint, lilac, sunshine and sky, they are fully lined and super comfortable, made of the softest denim and lined in 100% combed cotton so there are no seams to irritate little legs. This also makes them ideal for all seasons, worn with no tops and turned up in the warmer summer months or with layers in the autumn and winter.

As with all our clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups mean they can be worn for at least a year and they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Stonewash Denim Dress
item.g:description:
DOTTY CLASSIC

Back by popular demand, this style has become a Dotty Classic! This super soft traditional stonewash denim dungaree dress is perfect paired with a classic stripe tee in the summer, or any of our long sleeve winter tops. A timeless design that will last long after they've grown out of it...

It comes with Dotty details including adjustable straps, bespoke buttons, signature 100% cotton jersey lining  and adorable matching infinity blue jersey knickers up to 2-3y.

The denim is super soft, made of 99.8% cotton and 0.2% elastane. 


Dresses are available in Heart Print, Navy with Red Spots, Old Rose Pink, Mint, Ochre, Bright Red and Lilac.

item.g:title: Sky Blue Shorts
item.g:description:
These Sky Blue Shorts are the perfect choice for a summer look. Made from super soft fabric for ultimate comfort, these shorts come in a stylish sky blue color, giving you an effortless, fashionable style.

Made of the softest, most comfortable stonewashed denims, this classic retro collection is nostalgic through and through, with timeless shapes and washed out pastel summer colours. They have stepped right off the page of faded family photos from the 1970s, vintage camping trips or lazy summer days at the beach with children seeking the same adventures and simple pleasures now as they did then.

item.g:title: Sky Blue Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
Sky blue stretch denim dungarees with our signature Dotty blue lining.

  • Adjustable straps and turn-ups
  • 100% combed cotton jersey lining
  • Button loop shoulder straps instead of buckles to make them extra comfy for your tiddlies on the smallest sizes (3-6m / 6-12m) 
  • Zip access allows for quick and easy nappy changes (3m-24m)

All beautifully packaged in one of our Dolly & Otto 100% cotton rucksacks.

item.g:title: Stonewash LOVE Denim Dress
item.g:description:
NEW!

We've added a twist to our Classic Stonewash Range this season to brighten up a true wardrobe Classic. Beautifully embroidered on the front with your choice of design: LOVE or RAINBOW. 

The denim is super comfy yet durable as it has a tiny bit of stretch (99.8% cotton, 0.2% elastane) which makes it perfect from babies crawling to children climbing trees. Dotty details include adjustable straps, bespoke buttons, signature 100% cotton jersey lining and adorable matching knickers up to 2-3y. 

These dresses look perfect with the Peter Pan or Breton tops.

item.g:title: Stonewash RAINBOW Denim Dress
item.g:description:
NEW!

We've added a twist to our Classic Stonewash Range this season to brighten up a true wardrobe Classic. Beautifully embroidered on the front with your choice of design: LOVE or RAINBOW. 

The denim is super comfy yet durable as it has a tiny bit of stretch (99.8% cotton, 0.2% elastane) which makes it perfect from babies crawling to children climbing trees. Dotty details include adjustable straps, bespoke buttons, signature 100% cotton jersey lining and adorable matching knickers up to 2-3y. 

These dresses look perfect with the Peter Pan or Breton tops.

item.g:title: Stonewash LOVE Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

We've added a twist to our Classic Stonewash Range this season. Choose from a selection of embroidered designs to brighten up a true wardrobe Classic. Beautifully embroidered front and back with your choice of design: LOVE, GOOD VIBES and SMILE. 

What could be more traditional than our super soft stonewash denim dungarees? Lined in 100% combed cotton jersey, these have been a hit generation after generation and are sure to last for many more.

Timeless in both shape and style and complete with our unique Dotty features including bespoke bumble bee buttons, zip access for nappy changing (up to 2-3y) and adjustable straps and turn ups, these are designed to be worn a full year and work just as well with a striped summer tee on the beach as paired with a long-sleeve top and a jumper in the chillier months.

The denim is super comfy yet durable as it has a tiny bit of stretch (99.8% cotton, 0.2% elastane) which makes it perfect from babies crawling to children climbing trees. As with all Dotty Dungaree clothes, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

Our stonewash collection is classic in both shape and style and complete with our unique Dotty features including bespoke bumble bee buttons, zip access for nappy changing (up to 2-3y) and adjustable straps and turn ups, these are designed to be worn a full year and work just as well with a  summer tee on the beach as paired with a long-sleeve top and a jumper in the chillier months.

The denim is super comfy yet durable (100% cotton) which makes it perfect from babies crawling to children climbing trees. As with all Dotty Dungaree clothes, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Sunshine Yellow Shorts
item.g:description:
These sunshine yellow shorts are retro-style and super soft, providing unparalleled comfort and a boost of happiness. With its unique shade of yellow, you can be sure to stand out in any crowd.

Made of the softest, most comfortable brushed denims, this classic retro collection is nostalgic through and through, with timeless shapes and washed out pastel summer colours. They have stepped right off the page of faded family photos from the 1970s, vintage camping trips or lazy summer days at the beach with children seeking the same adventures and simple pleasures now as they did then.

item.g:title: The Jack Tee - Lilac
item.g:description:
The Jack Tee is crafted with 100% cotton for ultimate comfort and breathability. It's soft touch and bright hue bring a classic, timeless look. A wardrobe essential to enjoy for years to come.

They are available in beautiful pastel colours to complement our pastel palette, mint, pink, lilac and pale blue plus primary red, green and yellow.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% cotton, 5% elastane making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: The Jack Tee - Pale Blue
item.g:description:
The Jack Tee is crafted with 100% cotton for ultimate comfort and breathability. It's soft touch and bright hue bring a classic, timeless look. A wardrobe essential to enjoy for years to come.

They are available in beautiful pastel colours to complement our pastel palette, mint, pink, lilac and pale blue plus primary red, green and yellow.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% cotton, 5% elastane making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Teal Cord Dress
item.g:description: NEW

item.g:title: Classic Wide Stripe Denim Shorts - Blue
item.g:description:
NEW!

Go retro in style with these classic Stonewash Stripe Shorts! Made from 100% cotton, these throwback shorts will make you feel like you stepped right out of the 70's. With a hint of nostalgia, you'll be sure to make a statement that will have your friends saying, "Groovy!"

They are a summery take on our classic denim collection, they never go out of style, and can be worn as they are or paired with any of our tops.

item.g:title: The Jack Tee - Blue
item.g:description:
NEW!

These brand new organic cotton t-shirts with colourful edges are super versatile and work perfectly with all outfits. Available in all the primary colours - Red, Blue and Yellow!

These super soft t-shirts are 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane, making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Teal Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our best-selling super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. This year's collection includes all your old favourites - Navy, Ochre, Old Rose Pink, Bright Red, Ochre and Moss - as well as the brighter Hot Pink and Atlantic Blue. We have also added a new wintry palette of Teal, Charcoal, Robin Red, Nordic Blue and Mint. 

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining and are machine washable with similar colours up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: The Jack Tee - Mint
item.g:description:
These adorable cotton t-shirts with colourful edges are super versatile and work perfectly with all outfits. They are available in beautiful pastel colours to complement our ice cream denims: mint, pink, lilac, yellow and pale blue.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% cotton, 5% elastane making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Sunshine Yellow Dungarees
item.g:description:
These Sunshine Yellow Dungarees are the perfect pick-me-up for any blah-feeling day! Constructed from super soft fabric and designed with retro-inspired style, they promise to bring a little joy and happiness to your wardrobe. So, don't wait to get your sunshine on- slip into these dungarees and give your day a happy, glowy upgrade!

Available in mint, lilac, sunshine and sky, they are fully lined and super comfortable, made of the softest denim and lined in 100% combed cotton so there are no seams to irritate little legs. This also makes them ideal for all seasons, worn with no tops and turned up in the warmer summer months or with layers in the autumn and winter.

As with all our clothes, the adjustable straps and turn ups mean they can be worn for at least a year and they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

Made of the softest fabrics (you genuinely have to feel them to believe it!) they come in the softest shade of rainbow and pale blue.

item.g:title: Tie Dye Blue Shorts
item.g:description:
Let your retro flag fly with these Tie Dye Shorts! These 90s-inspired shorts are super soft and seriously cool. Disco in the summer sun and stay comfortable in style. Get your groove on in these tie dyed beauties!

Made of the softest fabrics (you genuinely have to feel them to believe it!) they come in the softest shade of rainbow and pale blue.

item.g:title: Tie Dye Rainbow Dress
item.g:description:
Let your retro flag fly with these Tie Dye Dresses! These 90s-inspired vibes are super soft and seriously cool. Disco in the summer sun and stay comfortable in style. Get your groove on in these tie dyed beauties!

Made of the softest fabrics (you genuinely have to feel them to believe it!) they come in the softest shade of rainbow.

item.g:title: The Jack Tee - Unicorn
item.g:description:
NEW!

Unicorn alert!

These adorable organic cotton t-shirts with colourful edges are super versatile and work perfectly with all outfits. They are available in beautiful pastel colours to complement our ice cream denims: lilac, mint, pink, yellow and pale blue. Plus our brand new Unicorn Print version!

These super soft t-shirts are 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Vintage Plum Corduroy Dungarees
item.g:description:
Our best-selling winter cord are back in beautiful new winter colours: Ochre, Mint, Robin Red, Brick Red, Vintage Plum, Charcoal Grey and Nordic Blue. 

They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m).

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

All dotty dungarees, dresses and shorts are lined in 100% combed cotton jersey lining and are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Vintage Plum Corduroy Dress
item.g:description: Our best-selling winter cord dresses are back, in a range of seasonal colours. Made from the softest needlepoint cord with our signature 100% cotton jersey lining and with matching knickers up to 2-3y, they are the perfect winter choice for blustery outdoor adventures as well as cosy fireside days. Dresses available in Old Rose Pink, Brick Red, Ochre, Vintage Plum and Bright Red.

item.g:title: Unicorn Shorts
item.g:description:
Unicorn Shorts are the ideal choice for a girly favourite. With unicorn perfection, their super cute style and oh so soft fabric make them a must-have. Make any look magical with these stylish shorts.

As always, they have all the unique Dotty features:

- bespoke bumble bee brass buttons
- adjustable straps so they can be worn a full year, and then passed down to siblings/friends
- super soft, durable, quality fabrics
- perfect from crawling to climbing trees
- matches any Dotty Dungarees top for the perfect adventure outfit
- fully machine washable
- classic unisex cuts with generous sizing
- retro, vintage, nostalgic

Dotty Dungarees is a female founded brand, based in the UK, and stocked all over the world.

item.g:title: Yellow Gold Cord Shorts
item.g:description:
Our winter cord shorts are back a range of classic colours: Navy, Old Rose Pink, Yellow, Moss Green and Bright Red. They are perfect teamed with any of the Dotty tops. They come with signature Dotty details including adjustable straps, adorable turn-ups and bespoke buttons.

Our super soft needlepoint cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them!

item.g:title: White Summer Tee
item.g:description: The classic white summer tee. It's practically perfect in every way... Seriously soft yet stretchy, round neck detail and roll up sleeves. Stock up fast, you'll want one in every size...

item.g:title: Yellow Stripe Summer T-Shirt
item.g:description:
Our bestselling Summer Stripe Tees are back and are now made of organic cotton! They are available in Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green and Grey stripes. The classic shape comes with a distinctive solid stripe around the neckline and is perfect under any of the Dotty Dungarees collection of dresses, shorts or full length dungers.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane, making them quick and easy to slip over little heads.

item.g:title: Yellow Denim Shorts
item.g:description:
NEW!!

The softest summer shorts in our bestselling brushed denim, these adorable new additions to the Dotty Dungarees summer collection come in Olive Green, Yellow and Cornflower Blue. Their classic shape and muted colours make them completely unisex.
 
They come with the signature Dotty details including adjustable straps and bespoke buttons. The brushed denim is 96% cotton, 4% elastane.

item.g:title: Yolk Yellow Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!!
 
Put a Spring in your step with our rainbow dungaree collection... red, yellow, pink, green, blue and grey... Our new brushed denim dungarees are unbelievably soft inside and out. You wont want to stop stroking them! 
 
With all our special Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last, zip access for quick and easy nappy changes (up to 24m) and our 100% combed cotton dotty jersey lining.

item.g:title: Yellow Seersucker Dress
item.g:description: Our bestselling seersuckers are finally back in stock in the sweetest of summer colours! This classic dungaree dress will brighten any wardrobe! The perfect outfit for summer days, wondering barefoot on the beach or with wellies for the wetter weather. As with all Dotty clothes, the adjustable straps mean they really do last.

item.g:title: Yellow Seersucker Shorts
item.g:description: These classic yellow seersucker dungaree shorts will brighten any wardrobe! They are the perfect outfit for summer days, wondering barefoot on the beach or with wellies for the wetter weather. As with all Dotty clothes, the adjustable straps mean they really do last. And with unisex colours, they can be handed down to boys and girls alike for generations to come.

item.g:title: Factory Winter Glove
item.g:description:
This is a demonstration store. You can purchase products like this from The Ski Chalet & Treasure Cove Scuba.

  • HYDROGAUGE™ This rating system allows for a comparative measure of waterproofing and breathability, performance features specifically engineered for skiing and snowboarding in the harshest environments.
  • WATERPROOF Our technologies in waterproofing optimize protection without choking off breathability. This ensures comfort in apparel, and helps minimize odor in accessories by reducing the threat of microbial growth among contents that are stored while still moist.
  • WINDPROOF Wind chill can quickly lower body temperature, diminishing performance and threatening safety with hypothermia. "Windproof" apparel is designed to prevent wind penetration for added comfort and protection.
  • WINDSTOPPER® This textile is fully windproof, yet it offers maximum breathability to minimize moisture buildup and maintain performance comfort.

item.g:title: Aroha Baby 24-7 Trouser Midnight
item.g:description:
Smalls technical soft Merino regulates body temperature, meaning no overheating by adapting to cool or warm environments. Smalls wicks moisture away from the skin, acting as a second skin for those with sensitivities.

  • ETHICAL 'Responsible' Merino Wool
  • 100 % Merino - no hidden nasties, cheaper substitutes or green washing
  • Multipurpose garments, thoughtfully designed
  • Traceable, ZQ Certified Farms, New Zealand Merino
  • SOFT, Eczema healing
  • Spun in Biela Italy (home of Zegna) the only mill in the world with EMAS* certification for environmental practices
  • Made at a family run makers in Portugal
  • Multi award winning British Brand with a special kiwi connection.
  • 17.5 micron, denser superfine knit for durability and skin love.

Click here for Size Chart

item.g:title: Aroha Baby 24/7 Trouser in Berry Marle
item.g:description:
Introducing two new standout shades both in an innovative microspun 100% Merino, this lighter weight wool (just 17 microns compared to a human hair at around 60 microns) has proven benefits for eczema-prone skin in children. Ideal as multipurpose layering pieces; Smalls work perfectly under school uniforms, sports kits, as base layers for skiing as well doubling up as seriously snuggly loungewear and pyjamas.

  • 100% Superfine Merino Wool
  • Gentle Machine Wash
  • Naturally stretchy for maximum movement

item.g:title: CLOTHES DOCTOR ECO WASH FOR CASHMERE AND WOOL
item.g:description:
Smalls have been searching for a perfect wool wash to recommend to you and we think we have finally found it! 

Clothes Doctor No.3 Eco Wash for Cashmere and Wool is a gentle pH neutral formula that extends the life of your knitwear through cleaning, renewing and softening. It is lightly scented with Himalayan cedarwood and orange oil, to provide natural moth defence. Use this treatment in a hand wash or add to a delicate machine cycle. After washing, dry your garment flat on a towel, and savour the lingering aroma of wonderful essential oils.

This luxurious liquid is also the perfect alternative to dry cleaning, which is damaging to our clothes and planet. It is also packaged in 100% aluminium with a compostable label, making it infinitely recyclable in an efficient closed-loop system.

item.g:title: Knitted By Nana - Cream
item.g:description:
ONE SIZE 0-9 months

Hand knitted by their resident Nana, these beanies are super cute and super soft. Nana uses 10 ply Luxury 100% Merino Wool from the Bendigo Woollen Mills, giving the beanies an exquisitely soft handle - the most luxurious pure wool yarn available in Australia.

Australian made.

item.g:title: CLOTHES DOCTOR NATURAL FRAGRANCE BAG
item.g:description:
Create a revitalising fragrance for your wardrobe with Clothes Doctor 100% cotton Fragrance Bags that are filled with a blend of natural ingredients. Sustainably-sourced Yorkshire lavender, patchouli, lemongrass and eucalyptus. ...there's absolutely nothing artificial about it!

Place Clothes Doctor chemical-free moth deterrent in your cupboards and drawers (especially near anything made from animal fibres, including wool, silk, cashmere, feathers and even leather) and keep the moths away! 

For best results change every 3 months and crush the flowers regularly to release more fragrance.

The 24/7 trouser - so called because you could live in them day and night. 280g Italian Spun 100% fully traceable New Zealand Merino.

Cool when it's warm and warm when it's cool. Our Charcoal 24/7 is smart enough to be worn out, and just as perfect for lounging about, international air travel and general good living.

With super soft skin friendly fabric, our signature foldable cuff gives versatility in the way you wear them. Smalls' range has a truly luxurious feel and superb fit.  

(see size chart for more details)

  • Tailored fit
  • foldable cuff and pockets
  • 100% Italian Spun New Zealand Merino in 17.5 micron
  • New Zealand Merino made in Portugal
  • Gentle Machine Wash

item.g:title: Knitted By Nana - Koala
item.g:description:
ONE SIZE 0-9 months

Hand knitted by their resident Nana, these beanies are super cute and super soft. Nana uses 10 ply Luxury 100% Merino Wool from the Bendigo Woollen Mills, giving the beanies an exquisitely soft handle - the most luxurious pure wool yarn available in Australia.

Australian made.

item.g:title: Merino Long Sleeve, Forest Green
item.g:description:
Introducing two new standout shades both in an innovative microspun 100% Merino, this lighter weight wool (just 17 microns compared to a human hair at around 60 microns) has proven benefits for eczema-prone skin in children. Ideal as multipurpose layering pieces; Smalls work perfectly under school uniforms, sports kits, as base layers for skiing as well doubling up as seriously snuggly loungewear and pyjamas.

  • 100% Superfine Merino Wool
  • Machine Wash
  • Naturally stretchy for maximum movement
  • Longer in the body to keep out pesky draughts
  • Contrast stitching for a cheeky pop of colour

Click here for Size Chart

item.g:title: Merino Long Sleeve, Midnight
item.g:description:
Smalls work perfectly under school uniforms, as a base layer for outdoor as well doubling up as seriously SOFT loungewear.
  • Longer in the body to keep out pesky draughts
  • Curved hem
  • Model is 8 years old and wearing 9-10y

Smalls technical soft Merino regulates body temperature, meaning no overheating by adapting to cool or warm environments. Smalls wicks moisture away from the skin, acting as a second skin for those with sensitivities. 

  • ETHICAL 'Responsible' Merino Wool
  • 100 % Merino - no hidden nasties, cheaper substitutes or green washing
  • Multipurpose garments, thoughtfully designed
  • Traceable, ZQ Certified Farms, New Zealand Merino
  • SOFT, Eczema healing
  • Spun in Biela Italy (home of Zegna) the only mill in the world with EMAS* certification for environmental practises
  • Made at a family run makers in Portugal
  • Multi award winning, British Brand with a special kiwi connection.
  • 17.5 micron, denser superfine knit for durability and skin love. 

Modelled by our lockdown kids crew, friends and neighbours, everyday life in action, Photographed by Tatiana Wills - read our lockdown love story here.

item.g:title: Merino Snood, Berry Marle
item.g:description:
Smalls' Snoods can be worn every which way... Scarf, headband, hat, face mask you name it the snood can do it!
The perfect protection winter or summer, city walk or ski slopes, naturally wicking moisture away from the face and quick drying. Merino has also been proven to filter air pollution!
  • 100% Superfine Fully traceable certified Merino Wool
  • Machine Wash COLD
  • Contrast stitching for a cheeky pop of colour
  • naturally sustainable

item.g:title: Smalls for Harrods Alpine White Vest Top
item.g:description:
Exclusive ALPINE WHITE from happy Merino sheep raised on picturesque farms in NEW ZEALAND and transformed to amazing 17.5micron fabric only inside our suppliers factory in Biella ITALY, the ONLY mill in the world that has obtained EMAS* certification.
 
Find Smalls Alpine White EXCLUSIVELY at Harrods Knightbridge, London on the 4th floor Kids Essentials and online at harrods.com

LIMITED AVAILABILITY IN SMALLS STORE!

 

**fit note: go up a size in this fabric as the finer knit makes it slightly less stretchy in one direction.

item.g:title: Smalls x Oeuf NYC Best Long Sleeve
item.g:description:
Smalls limited edition collaboration with Oeuf NYC.

We’re delighted to collaborate with Oeuf on this new ‘Under Pressure’ Merino line.  Sustainable fashion is rapidly becoming a global issue and is very close to our hearts at Smalls.  The ‘Fast Fashion’[1] phenomenon with cheap clothing with a quick turnover that encourages people to keep buying is increasingly coming under fire for encouraging people to wear items only a few times before dumping them with environmental impacts including water pollution, adding to landfill, the release of toxic chemicals in production as well as plastic fibres being washed into our oceans.

Our hopes are that this ‘Under Pressure’ line will further raise awareness of the importance of buying less and choosing well when it comes to fashion choices

 

[1] The latest report by campaign group Wrap suggests that about 300,000 tonnes of clothing are thrown away in the UK each year, making fashion the industry with the fourth largest environmental impact after housing, transport and foods.

item.g:title: SMALLS X HARRODS exclusive Alpine White Long Sleeve
item.g:description:
Exclusive ALPINE WHITE from happy Merino sheep raised on picturesque farms in NEW ZEALAND and transformed to amazing 17.5micron fabric only inside our suppliers factory in Biella ITALY, the ONLY mill in the world that has obtained EMAS* certification.
 
Find Smalls Alpine White EXCLUSIVELY at Harrods Knightsbridge London on the 4th floor Kids Essentials and online at harrods.com now

 

**fit note: go up a size in this fabric as the finer knit makes it slightly less stretchy in one direction.

item.g:title: Smalls x Cissy Wears Long Sleeve Tee
item.g:description:
(I'M OK) IN MY OWN SKIN

#activistbycissywears

A children’s empowerment movement that aims to give kids a voice. They are curious, they want to right the wrongs of the world.  A collaboration for British Wool Week. "(I'M OK) IN MY OWN SKIN" resonates perfectly with Smalls superfine pure Merino as next to skin layers, which act genuinely as a second skin, regulating temperature, wicking moisture and giving kids extreme freedom of movement. More importantly, it recognises and celebrates the diversity in our society and teaches our children to believe in themselves, and be true to that perfectly imperfect self.

Introducing two new standout shades both in an innovative microspun 100% Merino, this lighter weight wool (just 17 microns compared to a human hair at around 60 microns) has proven benefits for eczema-prone skin in children. Ideal as multipurpose layering pieces; Smalls work perfectly under school uniforms, sports kits, as base layers for skiing as well doubling up as seriously snuggly loungewear and pyjamas.

item.g:title: The 24 Hour Trouser, Rachel Riley for Smalls, Dusty Blue
item.g:description:
Smalls technical soft Merino regulates body temperature, meaning no overheating by adapting to cool or warm environments. Smalls wicks moisture away from the skin, acting as a second skin for those with sensitivities. 

  • ETHICAL 'Responsible' Merino Wool
  • 100 % Merino - no hidden nasties, cheaper substitutes or green washing
  • Multipurpose garments, thoughtfully designed
  • Traceable, ZQ Certified Farms, New Zealand Merino
  • SOFT, Eczema healing
  • Spun in Biela Italy (home of Zegna) the only mill in the world with EMAS* certification for environmental practices
  • Made at a family run makers in Portugal
  • Multi award winning British Brand with a special kiwi connection
  • 17.5 micron, denser superfine knit for durability and skin love
  • contrast stitch for a cheeky pop of colour


Smalls work perfectly under school uniforms, as a base layer for outdoor as well doubling up as seriously SOFT loungewear.
  • Foldable cuffs for extra growing room.

item.g:title: Womens Merino Cami, French Navy
item.g:description:
Cool when its warm and warm when its cool and possibly one of the most versatile things we've ever created. Featuring a flattering V neck, this an essential item you will find yourself turning to again and again. Sitting perfectly under a shirt, EverCami keeps you at the perfect temperature while you carry on with your day. Dress up with a blazer or pair it down with our 24/7 Trouser and pop to your fave gym class, then why not carry on into the night and have a perfectly temperature regulated sleep. We're not actually sure when you need to take it off? :)

Harnessing Mother Nature’s most intelligent fibre; lightweight, supersoft 100% merino wool, Small’s covetable capsule range has a luxurious feel, superb fit and works hard for all occasions anytime, anywhere.

item.g:title: Womens 24 Hour Trouser, 280g Heavyweight, Charcoal
item.g:description:
The 24/7 trouser - so called because you could live in them day and night. 280g Italian Spun 100% fully traceable New Zealand Merino. ( I can honestly say I haven't taken them off much since they arrived in our studio!)

Cool when it's warm and warm when it's cool. Our Charcoal 24/7 heavier weight at 280g is smart enough to be worn out, and just as perfect for lounging about, international air travel and general good living. 

With super soft skin friendly fabric, our signature foldable cuff gives versatility in the way you wear them. Smalls' range has a truly luxurious feel and superb fit. 

  • Tailored fit
  • foldable cuff and pockets
  • 100% Italian Spun New Zealand 280g Merino in 17.5 micron
  • New Zealand Merino made in Portugal
  • Gentle Machine Wash

item.g:title: Womens 24hour Trouser, 190g Lightweight, Rose Fudge
item.g:description:
Foldable cuffs for extra length if needed. Model id 5"8 and wears a Small

Smalls technical soft Merino regulates body temperature, meaning no overheating by adapting to cool or warm environments. Smalls wicks moisture away from the skin, acting as a second skin for those with sensitivities. 

  • ETHICAL 'Responsible' Merino Wool
  • 100 % Merino - no hidden nasties, cheaper substitutes or green washing
  • Multipurpose garments, thoughtfully designed

  • Made at a family run makers in Portugal

Merino has been scientifically proven to give you 15min extra sleep a night, this weight is perfect for that.  


Modelled by professional dancer Lilly Wills, Photographed by Tatiana Wills - read our lockdown love story here.

item.g:title: #1 Personalised Heart
item.g:description:
#1 personalised heart. Perfect for mums, friends, granny's or any loved one, the list is endless!

Personalise with a name underneath the #1 (e.g. Mummy, Nanny, Auntie or Alice) and some names or words of your choice underneath.

It's made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a toffee coloured faux suede cord.

14 x 12cm.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: 'Christmas with the' Stars Plaque
item.g:description:
Decorate your house this year with our 'Christmas with the' Stars Plaque. It's the perfect addition for around the home and would be such a lovely addition to a Christmas Eve box that can be used year upon year as a family tradition.

We can change 'Father Christmas' to your choice of nickname, such as Santa, St Nicholas, Santa Claus etc and include multiple children's names.

It's are made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a toffee suede cord and is approximately 14 x 17.5cm. 

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: 'Dream Big' Wall Sign
item.g:description:
Add an element of fun to your little one's playroom, nursery or bedroom with this Scandi inspired 'dream big' wooden lettering.

These words look lovely as wall art, propped on a shelf or even when used as flatlay props. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood.

Available in four sizes

Mini - Each word is approx 10cm in height
Small - Each word is approx 17cm in height
Medium - Each word is approx 27cm in height
Large - Each word is approx 34cm in height

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: 'Stop Here For' Door Hanger - House
item.g:description:
Decorate your house this year with our ‘Stop Here For’ Door Hanger and be sure to let Santa know where to leave the presents. It's the perfect addition to your little one's door handle and would be such a lovely addition to a Christmas Eve box that can be used year upon year as a family tradition.

We can change 'Father Christmas' to your choice of nickname, such as Santa, St Nicholas, Santa Claus etc and include multiple children's names.

It's are made from raw unpainted birch plywood and is approximately 26 x 11.5cm. 

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Animal Teeth Magnetic Picture Frame
item.g:description:
Double sided animal teeth and straight edge magnetic picture frame.

Each hanger is hand made from 3mm FSC certified plywood and will show off any prints beautifully. The frames are sleek, modern and are strung with neutral cotton cord. They are designed to display portrait orientation prints (not landscape), however if you bought an A3 frame it would fit an A4 landscape print.

Works just as well turned around with the straight edge if you fancy a change. Will also magnetic onto a locker or similar for a cool magnetic picture hanger.

Each plywood strip is fitted with two strong magnets, which come together to keep your artwork securely in position. String and magnets are discreetly hidden within the frame so the front of the hanger remains clean and sleek.

Print and wall hook are not included.

If you find the frame overlaps your artwork too much, they can be repositioned by carefully pulling the frames downwards slightly, as the magnets are strong enough to hold the artwork even if only half is touching.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded and edges rounded.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 2 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:description:
Add an element of fun to your little one's playroom, nursery or bedroom with this Scandi inspired wooden flag. Perfect as a wonderful gift too!

 

These flags look lovely as wall art, propped on a shelf or even when used as flatlay props. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood. Each one is lovingly sanded, painted and assembled by hand in our little Devon studio. 

There is a choice of 12 colours so that they can be completely customised. Choose one colour for the tassels and one for the text. 

Add in to the boxes which colour you'd like for the tassels and which for the text.

Colours:

Candyfloss
Cherry
Spearmint
Forest
Ocean
Midnight
Mustard
Glitter Mustard
White
Black
Oak
Walnut

Approx 33.5 x 14cm.

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:description:

item.g:title: Dinosaur Wall Hooks
item.g:description:
Dinosaur wall hooks ready to put that roarrr in to your decor from the home of the original wall hook.

Do you live in a rental where you can't make holes in the wall or like to move decor about in your house lots? Then these are for you... Just stick them to the wall and hang up your plaque or wall hanging.

They stick to the wall via 3m Command Adhesive Strips so are damage-free, hold strongly, remove cleanly and are easy to apply without making any holes. They are suitable for most smooth surfaces including painted walls, tiles, metal and wood.

item.g:title: Feelin Jolly Flag
item.g:description:
Add an element of fun to your little one's playroom, nursery or bedroom with this Scandi inspired wooden flag. Perfect as a wonderful gift too!

These flags look lovely as wall art, propped on a shelf or even when used as flatlay props. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood. Each one is lovingly sanded, painted and assembled by hand in our little Devon studio. 

There is a choice of 12 colours so that they can be completely customised. Choose one colour for the tassels and one for the text. 

Add in to the boxes which colour you'd like for the tassels and which for the text.

Colours:

Candyfloss
Cherry
Spearmint
Forest
Ocean
Midnight
Mustard
Glitter Mustard
White
Black
Oak
Walnut

Approx 33.5 x 14cm.

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

item.g:title: Flower Wall Hooks (Set of 2)
item.g:description:
Flower wall hooks ready to to add some prettiness to your decor from the home of the original wall hook.

Do you live in a rental where you can't make holes in the wall or like to move decor about in your house lots? Then these are for you... Just stick them to the wall and hang up your plaque or wall hanging.

Wall hooks come in sets of 2 or you can get a set with all four design in it.

They stick to the wall via 3m Command Adhesive Strips so are damage-free, hold strongly, remove cleanly and are easy to apply without making any holes. They are suitable for most smooth surfaces including painted walls, tiles, metal and wood.

What do you get: A wall hook each with a Command Adhesive Strip.

They made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a 3m command strip to attach them to the wall.

Each individual hook is about 5cm tall.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

item.g:description:
Add an element of fun to your little one's playroom, nursery or bedroom with this Scandi inspired wooden flag. Perfect as a wonderful gift too!

There is a choice of 12 colours so that they can be completely customised. Choose one colour for the tassels and one for the text. 

Add in to the boxes which colour you'd like for the tassels and which for the text.

Candyfloss
Cherry
Spearmint
Forest
Ocean
Midnight
Mustard
Glitter Mustard
White
Black
Oak
Walnut

item.g:description:

Do you live in a rental where you can't make holes in the wall or like to move decor about in your house lots? Then these are for you... Just stick them to the wall and hang up your plaque or wall hanging.

Create names, fun sayings, merry christmas, happy birthday or anything you wish. Each individual letter is approx 10 x 7cm. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a toffee suede cord. Fantastic to use year after year for special occasions or all year round in the house.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Letter Plaques Engraved
item.g:description:
The Letter Plaque is a gorgeous addition to any room and can be personalised with a letter or number of your choice.

It's made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a toffee suede cord.

14cm diameter.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Magnetic Poster Frame
item.g:description:
Straight edge magnetic picture frame.

Each hanger is hand made from 3mm FSC certified plywood and will show off any prints beautifully. The frames are sleek, modern and are strung with neutral cotton cord. They are designed to display portrait orientation prints (not landscape), however if you bought an A3 frame it would fit an A4 landscape print.

Works just as well turned around with the straight edge if you fancy a change. Will also magnetic onto a locker or similar for a cool magnetic picture hanger.

Each plywood strip is fitted with two strong magnets, which come together to keep your artwork securely in position. String and magnets are discreetly hidden within the frame so the front of the hanger remains clean and sleek.

Print and wall hook are not included.

If you find the frame overlaps your artwork too much, they can be repositioned by carefully pulling the frames downwards slightly, as the magnets are strong enough to hold the artwork even if only half is touching.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded and edges rounded.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 2 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Medium Striped Letters
item.g:description:
Medium striped letters to make a real impact on shelves or walls. Perfect to use as a single letter or multiple to make up words. They are engraved to look 3D and their neutral classic look means they suit any room in the house.  They are approximately 25cm in height and made from 3mm raw unpainted birch plywood.

We also have some large letters at 55cm and small ones at 10cm available.

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

item.g:title: Mermaid Tail Wall Hooks (set of 2)
item.g:description:
Set of 2 Mermaid wall hooks ready to to add some prettiness to your decor from the home of the original wall hook.

Do you live in a rental where you can't make holes in the wall or like to move decor about in your house lots? Then these are for you... Just stick them to the wall and hang up your plaque or wall hanging.

Wall hooks come in sets of 2.

They stick to the wall via 3m Command Adhesive Strips so are damage-free, hold strongly, remove cleanly and are easy to apply without making any holes. They are suitable for most smooth surfaces including painted walls, tiles, metal and wood.

What do you get: A wall hook each with a Command Adhesive Strip.

They made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a 3m command strip to attach them to the wall.

Each individual hook is about 8cm diameter and 5cm high.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Merry & Bright Flag
item.g:description:
Add an element of fun to your little one's playroom, nursery or bedroom with this Scandi inspired wooden flag. Perfect as a wonderful gift too!

These flags look lovely as wall art, propped on a shelf or even when used as flatlay props. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood. Each one is lovingly sanded, painted and assembled by hand in our little Devon studio. 

There is a choice of 12 colours so that they can be completely customised. Choose one colour for the tassels and one for the text. 

Add in to the boxes which colour you'd like for the tassels and which for the text.

Colours:

Candyfloss
Cherry
Spearmint
Forest
Ocean
Midnight
Mustard
Glitter Mustard
White
Black
Oak
Walnut

Approx 33.5 x 14cm.

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:description:
The perfect way to celebrate Christmas with this handmade keepsake decoration. Stylish and festive, they will make a beautiful addition to your Christmas tree this year and for years to come. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood and coloured acrylic and comes with a toffee suede cord.

Each bauble is approximately 8x9cm. It comes in 3 different colours, black, gold and silver.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Merry Flag
item.g:description:
Add an element of fun to your little one's playroom, nursery or bedroom with this Scandi inspired wooden flag. Perfect as a wonderful gift too!

These flags look lovely as wall art, propped on a shelf or even when used as flatlay props. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood. Each one is lovingly sanded, painted and assembled by hand in our little Devon studio. 

There is a choice of 12 colours so that they can be completely customised. Choose one colour for the tassels and one for the text. 

Add in to the boxes which colour you'd like for the tassels and which for the text.

Colours:

Candyfloss
Cherry
Spearmint
Forest
Ocean
Midnight
Mustard
Glitter Mustard
White
Black
Oak
Walnut

Approx 33.5 x 14cm.

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:description:
