item.g:title: Scalloped Magnetic Poster Frame
item.g:description:
Double sided scalloped and straight edge magnetic picture frame.

Each hanger is hand made from 3mm FSC certified plywood and will show off any prints beautifully. The frames are sleek, modern and are strung with neutral cotton cord. They are designed to display portrait orientation prints (not landscape), however if you bought an A3 frame it would fit an A4 landscape print.

Works just as well turned around with the straight edge if you fancy a change. Will also magnetic onto a locker or similar for a cool magnetic picture hanger.

Each plywood strip is fitted with two strong magnets, which come together to keep your artwork securely in position. String and magnets are discreetly hidden within the frame so the front of the hanger remains clean and sleek.

Print and wall hook are not included.

If you find the frame overlaps your artwork too much, they can be repositioned by carefully pulling the frames downwards slightly, as the magnets are strong enough to hold the artwork even if only half is touching.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded and edges rounded.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 2 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

This Personalised Bauble is a perfect way to celebrate Christmas with the family. Stylish and festive, they will make a beautiful addition to your Christmas tree this year and for years to come. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood and coloured acrylic and comes with a toffee suede cord.

Each bauble can be personalised with up to 3 lines of text and is approximately 8x9cm. It comes in 3 different colours, black, gold and silver.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: The Original Wall Hooks
item.g:description:
The home of the original wall hook.

Do you live in a rental where you can't make holes in the wall or like to move decor about in your house lots? Then these are for you... Just stick them to the wall and hang up your plaque or wall hanging.

They stick to the wall via 3m Command Adhesive Strips so are damage-free, hold strongly, remove cleanly and are easy to apply without making any holes. They are suitable for most smooth surfaces including painted walls, tiles, metal and wood. Choose as many or as few as you want.

What do you get: a hooks each with a Command Adhesive Strip, just choose which options you want from:

Triangle, Circle, Raindrop, Square, Cross, Cloud, Moon, Batman, Planet, Bird, Flower, Mouse, Rabbit, Owl, Dog, Cat, Heart, Star, Lightening Bolt, Leaf.

They made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a 3m command strip to attach them to the wall.

Each individual hook is about 5cm diameter.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Personalised Wooden Magnetic Picture Frames
item.g:description:
I'm very excited to finally be offering these new wooden hanging frames. These Hangers can be personalised with a choice of two fonts in 3 different positions.

Each hanger is hand made from FSC certified plywood and will show off any prints beautifully. The frames are sleek, modern and are strung with neutral cotton cord. They are designed to display portrait orientation prints (not landscape), however if you bought an A3 frame it would fit an A4 landscape print.

Each plywood strip is fitted with two strong magnets, which come together to keep your artwork securely in position.

Print and wall hook are not included.

If you find the frame overlaps your artwork too much, they can be repositioned by carefully pulling the frames downwards slightly, as the magnets are strong enough to hold the artwork even if only half is touching.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded and edges rounded.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 2 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Script Wall Name
item.g:description:
One of our most popular items is the wall name. They are approximately 14cm in height and made from raw unpainted birch plywood.

Equally you can choose any word to be cut, not just a name.

We have 3 options to choose from: Classic, Script or Chunky Script.

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

item.g:title: Small Striped Letters
item.g:description:

They are engraved to look 3D and their neutral classic look means they suit any room in the house.  They are approximately 10cm in height and made from 3mm raw unpainted birch plywood.

We also have some large letters at 55cm and medium ones at 25cm available.

We recommend using 3M removable backing tape for fixing to walls.

item.g:description:
Add an element of fun to your little one's playroom, nursery or bedroom with this Scandi inspired wooden flag. Perfect as a wonderful gift too!

These flags look lovely as wall art, propped on a shelf or even when used as flatlay props. They are made from raw unpainted birch plywood. Each one is lovingly sanded, painted and assembled by hand in our little Devon studio. 

There is a choice of 12 colours so that they can be completely customised. Choose one colour for the tassels and one for the text. 

Add in to the boxes which colour you'd like for the tassels and which for the text.

Colours:

Candyfloss
Cherry
Spearmint
Forest
Ocean
Midnight
Mustard
Glitter Mustard
White
Black
Oak
Walnut

Approx 33.5 x 14cm.

The Taller than the trees plaque is a gorgeous addition to any room and a beautiful saying for the wall of your home.

It's made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a toffee suede cord.

14 x 18.5cm.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Shell Wall Hooks (set of 2)
item.g:description:
Shell wall hooks ready to to add some prettiness to your decor from the home of the original wall hook.

Do you live in a rental where you can't make holes in the wall or like to move decor about in your house lots? Then these are for you... Just stick them to the wall and hang up your plaque or wall hanging.

Wall hooks come in sets of 2 or you can get a set with all four design in it.

They stick to the wall via 3m Command Adhesive Strips so are damage-free, hold strongly, remove cleanly and are easy to apply without making any holes. They are suitable for most smooth surfaces including painted walls, tiles, metal and wood.

What do you get: A wall hook each with a Command Adhesive Strip.

They made from raw unpainted birch plywood and comes with a 3m command strip to attach them to the wall.

Each individual hook is about 5cm diameter.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded both sides to ensure no burn marks are left on the surface.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 1 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Wooden Magnetic Picture Frame
item.g:description:
Wooden magnetic hanging frames.

Each hanger is hand made from 6mm FSC certified plywood and will show off any prints beautifully. The frames are sleek, modern and are strung with neutral cotton cord. They are designed to display portrait orientation prints (not landscape), however if you bought an A3 frame it would fit an A4 landscape print.

Each plywood strip is fitted with two strong magnets, which come together to keep your artwork securely in position.

Print and wall hook are not included.

Have the option to add an original wall hook and save some money. Choose from the picture displayed.

If you find the frame overlaps your artwork too much, they can be repositioned by carefully pulling the frames downwards slightly, as the magnets are strong enough to hold the artwork even if only half is touching.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded and edges rounded.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 2 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

item.g:title: Zigzag Magnetic Picture Frame
item.g:description:
Double sided zigzag and straight edge magnetic picture frame.

Each hanger is hand made from 3mm FSC certified plywood and will show off any prints beautifully. The frames are sleek, modern and are strung with neutral cotton cord. They are designed to display portrait orientation prints (not landscape), however if you bought an A3 frame it would fit an A4 landscape print.

Works just as well turned around with the straight edge if you fancy a change. Will also magnetic onto a locker or similar for a cool magnetic picture hanger.

Each plywood strip is fitted with two strong magnets, which come together to keep your artwork securely in position. String and magnets are discreetly hidden within the frame so the front of the hanger remains clean and sleek.

Print and wall hook are not included.

If you find the frame overlaps your artwork too much, they can be repositioned by carefully pulling the frames downwards slightly, as the magnets are strong enough to hold the artwork even if only half is touching.

Please note the wood grain may vary from that shown in the pictures.

We take great pride in making all of our products, everything is made from FSC certified birch plywood and beautifully sanded and edges rounded.

Turnaround: All items are made to order by hand and can take up to 2 week. Please let me know if you need it sooner.

Decoration only: Items are not to be handled by children, they are for eyes only. Do not hang items above cots or beds or within a child's reach.

  • Colour: Ocean green
  • Recycled and Recyclable
  • Water resistant
  • Adjustable drawstring straps, designed for ease of use by children.

IS IT SAFE?

Of course!  It's made from the highest quality materials, all of them REACH certified and EU and & UK standard compliant, and no harsh chemicals or colouring were used.

item.g:description:

IS IT SAFE?

item.g:title: Adult Classic Stonewash Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Introducing the Adult Classic Stonewash Denim Dungarees, a timeless must-have for any vintage-inspired wardrobe. Crafted with premium 100% cotton, these dungarees evoke nostalgia with their classic, retro design. Whether you team them with your own outfit, or with a 'mummy and me' look to create the perfect family moment, these denim dungarees are the perfect way to give your wardrobe a timeless, vintage touch.

item.g:title: Adult Khaki Chunky Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Your wish is our command! Finally we have brought out our very own grown up dungarees!
 
For years, our customers have been asking us to make dungarees for them, not just their children, and they are finally here! This tiny capsule collection has all the hallmark dotty features and is perfect for parents who want to twin with their little ones, or anyone looking for the elusive perfect pair! Everyone needs a retro pair of dungarees, the comfiest clothes for life on the move and so versatile, from pregnancy and breast-feeding, to racing around with toddlers and tweens!

All dungarees are not made equal. And as with everything Dotty ours have a couple of key ingredients: classic cuts, a generous fit and made of the SOFTEST fabric out there. Our chunky corduroy dungarees are the comfiest item in our own wardrobes and will be in yours too! 

Stock is very limited, so grab yours while they last...

item.g:title: Adult Vintage Denim Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Take a style trip down memory lane with our Adult Vintage Denim Dungarees! These comfy throwback jeans are the perfect wardrobe staple, with a bit of 90s nostalgia thrown in for good measure. They're also perfect for that special mummy and me look – talk about a long time coming! So take a break from your current fashion and go retro in style.

item.g:title: Adult Wide Stripe Denim Dungarees - Blue
item.g:description:
NEW!

Retro never goes out of style! Look timeless in our Adult Wide Stripe Denim Dungarees in Blue. Made from 100% cotton, they’re super comfy and great for achieving a vintage look. Old-fashioned yet modern, these dungarees are finally yours to own!

item.g:title: ANIMAL PRINT MUSLIN 3-PACK - for newborn to 4 month old babies
item.g:description: <p>Triple pack of supersoft sensory muslin squares in high contrast black and white patterns. Designed to the millimetre to support babies' cognitive and visual development between birth and around four months. The ultimate multi-tasker also delivers sensory calm through our scientific patterns, created alongside our consultant Orthoptist. Pack includes a trio of muslin squares - 1 x zebra, 1 x starfish and 1 x dalmatian design presented in our stylish box packaging. Each muslin square is 60cm x 60cm. Made from: 100% GOTS Certified organic cotton Designed with Science - Working with both our consultant orthoptist, Laura, and in conjunction with the team at the Sussex Baby Lab, we've created products designed to the millimetre to support your baby's visual development. Better for the environment - Here at Etta Loves we're striving to make our products as sustainable as possible. Find out why we switched from bamboo to organic cotton here. A warm cup of tea- Being a new parent is hard. Etta Loves muslins are designed to support your baby and give you a well deserved moment of calm. View the complete sensory muslin square range here At birth a baby’s vision is blurry, and they can generally focus on a face at around 20-30cm away</p>

item.g:title: ANIMAL PRINT MUSLIN BLANKET - reversible newborn to 4 months / 5+ months
item.g:description:
This product qualifies for FREE UK SHIPPING. Click here to see shipping details Our organic cotton triple layer blanket provides perfect sensory stimulation on the go, when having a cuddle or for happier tummy time, and the stylish animal prints are sure to be loved by everyone. Reversible Dalmatian (newborn-4 month print) and Blue Leopard (5+ months) in super-soft organic cotton. Our patterns are expertly scaled and coloured by our consultant orthoptist specifically to support babies' visual and cognitive development throughout their first year. Comes in our gorgeous box packaging making it the perfect gift too. Size: Square 120cm x 120cm Made from: 100% GOTS Certified organic cotton Machine washable to make your life easier.
Babies are born with the receptor cells to detect colour, but they are still immature

item.g:title: Copy of Hera Co-sleep Crib
item.g:description:
Product Information:

Sleep is of the essence for us at Gaia Baby. With the Hera Crib, it’s built in. 

In this beautifully crafted real wood crib, with your baby close and secure, you will find easy and simple settings & adjustments to customize your Hera crib so that you and your baby sleep better, for longer.    

The Hera Co-Sleep Crib is specially designed to provide a safe, secure, and comfortable nights’ sleep for you and your baby. Safety certified to the highest global standards, this beautifully crafted crib is made from natural Ash, sustainably grown in the USA. Its gently curved ends in natural tones highlight the real grain of this eco-friendly wood. With stunning A-frame accents, its generous size makes it the perfect choice for a baby's first sleep space. 

 

Technical information:

The Hera Co-Sleep crib offers large, dual mesh paneled sides. Baby is always visible at eye level, and with each side designed to drop down, easily accessible, room side or bedside. 

  • Underneath your baby, is a unique perforated double layered base system.
  • This patent pending design creates an air cushion under your baby, ensuring 24/7, 360* air circulation for maximum peace of mind.
  • For fussy or restless sleepers, the dual base can be easily adjusted with our no-tools, integrated, Reflux setting.
  • With 5 different height adjustments, the Hera crib fits all parent bed styles from platform to divan style beds (parent mattress height 56.5cm to 70cm).
  • The crib top lifts easily off the base, which, fitted with castors, makes it super easy to move around the house or from room to room.
  • The luxurious interior of the crib is finished with a soft cotton jersey, gently padded with fully breathable, recycled, composite foam.
  • All interior fabrics can be removed easily, and machine washed. 

The Hera Crib comes complete with a superior quality, UK made mattress.

Free from harmful chemicals, the mattress features Kidtech foam which provides excellent support and helps to regulate body temperature.

The mattress cover is water resistant and washable up to 60 °C.

Extend the life of your Hera crib by repurposing it as a generous toy box or laundry unit with the addition of our felt storage boxes (sold separately).

The Hera Crib is part of the Hera Family Collection with the choice of coordinating Cot / Dresser / Wardrobe, Changing Station & accessories.

item.g:title:
Gaia Baby Aromatics -
Soothing & Relaxing
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Soothing & Relaxing 'Lavender & Jasmine' - Take the edge off a busy day and indulge in a relaxing fragrance for mind and body. This scent will make you feel like you've been whisked away to a spa. The perfect indulgent treat for mum or dad.
    2. Natural, hypoallergenic hand-poured candle. Free from any artificial perfumes or fragrance.
    3. Carefully selected, premium quality fragrances blended by hand with natural soy wax.
    4. Vegan, natural and biodegradable candle made with 100% pure organic soy wax.
    5. Free from petroleum, paraffin or beeswax products
    6. Designed to soothe your senses and help you unwind and relax.
    7. Cruelty free. None of our ingredients are tested on animals.

  • Unwind and relax at home with Gaia Baby Aromatics. Our natural handcrafted candles are made in Ireland by Candella artisan candle producers. Made with pure soy wax, this candle is infused with a floral, aquatic fragrance. Clear your mind, with this fresh aquatic scent infused with white jasmine and a hint of lavender to stimulate your senses.  

    Ingredients: Soy Wax & Essential Oils from Lavender, Jasmine and Lemon.

  • Burn time: 50 hrs approx.

    Product Weight: 350g

    Instructions: When you first light your Gaia Baby Aromatics Candle, let a full pool form allowing the melted wax reach the glass to avoid tunnelling. Keep the wick trimmed to 1cm when lighting. Burn candle for no longer than 3 - 4 hours at a time. Keep a burning candle away from children, pets, and draughts.

    Delivery Options: Standard delivery.

item.g:title:
Gaia Baby Aromatics -
Stimulating & Uplifting
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Stimulating & Uplifting 'Pink Pepper & Orange Flower' - Designed with busy parents in mind. Light this aroma when you need a little lift. The perfect morning or afternoon fragrance to help you tackle the day.
    2. Natural, hypoallergenic hand-poured candle. Free from any artificial perfumes or fragrance.
    3. Carefully selected, premium quality fragrances blended by hand with natural soy wax.
    4. Vegan, natural and biodegradable candle made with 100% pure organic soy wax.
    5. Free from petroleum, paraffin or beeswax products
    6. Perfect to stimulate your senses and helps you unwind and relax at home.
    7. Cruelty free. None of our ingredients are tested on animals.

  • This stimulating and uplifting fragrance designed exclusively for Gaia Baby Aromatics is laden with essential oils and natural ingredients. Our exclusive hand poured soy candles are made in Ireland by Candella artisan producers.

    Scent Notes: Soothing and relaxing fragrance with top notes of woody, oriental scents with an underlying sweet, rosy hint at the base. 

    Ingredients: Soy Wax, Essential Oils from pink pepper, orange, lemon, green galbanum, black pepper, rosemary 

  • Burn time: 50 hrs approx.

    Product Weight: 350g

    Instructions: When you first light your Gaia Baby Aromatics Candle, let a full pool form allowing the melted wax reach the glass to avoid tunnelling. Keep the wick trimmed to 1cm when lighting. Burn candle for no longer than 3 - 4 hours at a time. Keep a burning candle away from children, pets, and draughts.

    Delivery Options: Standard delivery.

item.g:title:
Gaia Baby Décor
Printable Wall Art Download
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
    1. PDF vector image can be printed to any size to fit your desired frame or space.
    2. Available in 4 beautiful palettes to suit your interior.
    3. Featuring hand drawn illustrations by Irish illustrator, Michele Munnelly.
    4. Designed to inspire joy and creativity in young imaginations.

  • Say hello to our latest Gaia Baby Décor collection of woodland creatures, available for instant download. If you're looking for a quick fix to add a pop of colour to your nursery or bedroom wall, then look no further.

    Our first collection is the beautiful Gaia Baby hand drawn illustration, Woodland Creatures. Featuring our happy owl and adorable singing birds playing in the woods, this lovable piece is designed for you to print at home. Print to fit your favourite frame or get creative using bulldog clips or magnetic strips. These little cuties are the perfect way to add an adventurous, woodland vibe to any room.

    Our friend and illustrator, Michèle Munnelly, captures these enchanting woodland creatures in an endearing piece of art that will inspire your imagination.

item.g:title: Gift Card
item.g:description:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Gaia Baby gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

item.g:title: Hera Junior Bed Extension Mattress
item.g:description:
Designed to be used with the Hera Junior Bed Extension to extend the use of your Hera Cot Bed for kids up to 7 years. This is a 40cm long mattress extension piece.

Hera Junior Bed Extension Mattress piece is a breathable, microfibre, pocket-sprung mattress suitable for your Hera Complete Sleep. The multiple high tensile pocket springs encapsulated in nursery grade foam provide responsive comfort and optimal body support.

While the adaptive springs provide targeted support based on your baby's movement and growth, the open cell nursery foam core helps maintain an ideal sleeping climate.

Quilted for a plump and comfy sleep surface, the mattress is anti-microbial and hypoallergenic. Machine washable at 40°, wipeable, water-resistant & certified latest BS & EN safety standards.

Dimensions: L40 x W60 x H10cm 

Warranty: 1 year warranty as standard.

For use with: Hera Cot Bed and Hera Junior Bed Extension

Delivery Options: Standard Delivery £12.50 (Free on orders over £50)

item.g:title: Leto Cot Bed
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Available to ship within 4 weeks of purchase
    2. Kerbside delivery only
    3. This product listed in our outlet is unused/new. The packaging may be imperfect. Don't miss your chance to grab a bargain!
    4. Products purchased from the Outlet are not eligible for returns / warranty / refunds. This does not affect your statutory rights. Unfortunately, we are unable to offer payment plans on our Outlet pieces.
    5. Gaia Baby only use 100% FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) certified solid wood- harvested from forests that are responsibly managed, socially beneficial & environmentally conscious
    6. Three adjustable mattress heights suitable from new born to 5 years
    7. The cot bed converts quickly and easily into a toddler bed- suitable up to approx 5 years
    8. Tested and fully certified to highest EU and UK standards using non-toxic, baby-safe paints
    9. Easy assembly (assembly time appx 30 mins)
    10. Assembled Dimensions: H 99.4 cm X W 75 cm X L 166 cm
    11. 2 years manufacturers warranty
    12. Mattress sold separately. Size required 140cm (L) x 70cm (W) x 10cm (H)

  • Beautifully crafted by the team at Gaia Baby, this classic 'Sleigh Bed' style cot grows with your child from birth to 5 years old. This generously sized cot bed offers the choice of 3 different mattress heights.

    Fully certified for use from newborn, the Gaia Leto Cot Bed easily transitions as your baby grows from Cot Bed to Toddler Bed to Junior Bed. Certified to exceed all European and UK standards and crafted with 'gold standard' FSC certified 100% solid wood and non-toxic baby safe paints. Ethically sourced and made with care and quality top of mind.

  • Assembled Dimensions: Cot Bed = L: 166cm W: 75cm H: 99.4cm

    Product Weight: Cot: 35kg

    Warranty: 2 Years/ Register for extended 3 year warranty

    Compatible Mattress: Leto Spring Mattress

    Delivery Options: Standard Furniture Delivery

item.g:title: Checkerboard Shorts - Pink
item.g:description:
NEW!

These pink Checkerboard Shorts exemplify 90s nostalgia in a playful and fun way. Crafted with super soft fabric, they are perfect for any adventure. With their cool, retro look, these shorts have the right combination of comfort, funk, and style.

As always, they have all the unique Dotty features:

- bespoke bumble bee brass buttons
- adjustable straps so they can be worn a full year, and then passed down to siblings/friends
- super soft, durable, quality fabrics
- perfect from crawling to climbing trees
- matches any Dotty Dungarees top for the perfect adventure outfit
- fully machine washable
- classic unisex cuts with generous sizing
- retro, vintage, nostalgic

Dotty Dungarees is a female founded brand, based in the UK, and stocked all over the world.

- fully machine washable
- classic unisex cuts with generous sizing

item.g:title: Colour Changing 3D Umbrella - Rainbow Unicorn
item.g:description: This is not just any colour changing umbrella! Featuring 3D elements and a brilliant little viewing panel to keep you nice and safe from the rain, these colour changing umbrellas will have you hoping for a rainy day! This design features a fabulous rainbow unicorn whose mouth you can peep through. Complete with a handy velcro tie to keep neatly closed when not in use. Suitable for ages 3+

item.g:title: Colour Changing 3D Umbrella - Space
item.g:description: This is not just any colour changing umbrella! Featuring 3D elements and a brilliant little viewing panel to keep you nice and safe from the rain, these colour changing umbrellas will have you hoping for a rainy day! This design features a colourful space person whose helmet you can peep through. Complete with a handy velcro tie to keep neatly closed when not in use. Suitable for ages 3+

item.g:title: Colour Changing Umbrella - One World
item.g:description: Who doesn’t like the rain… Little ones will soon love it with their magic colour changing umbrella. Every time you go out in the rain the design changes into colour. So much fun! Watch as the white areas magically change colour in the rain, as it dries out they go back to white and it happens all over again when the rain comes back. Featuring our wonderful children of the world design containing animals, kites, bicycles, handstanding people and much more! Complete with a handy velcro tie to keep neatly closed when not in use. Suitable for ages 3+

item.g:title: Dino 50pc Magic Moving Puzzle
item.g:description: Prepare to be blown away by our marvellous Magic Moving Puzzles! You’ll have so much fun with the lenticular finish, allowing you to watch a terrific T-rex, striking Stegosaurus and more, moving right in front of your eyes. Complete the puzzle with 50 big, chunky puzzle pieces and once it’s finished, have even more fun moving it from side to side to make the magic happen, playing a game of spot the difference! 50 high quality puzzle pieces. Lenticular finish making the graphics move magically. Improves problem solving skills. Decorative keepsake box Recommended age: 5. Complete puzzle size: 50 x 40cm.

item.g:title: Dino Transparent Colour Changing Umbrella
item.g:description: Who doesn’t like the rain… your little ones will soon love it with their magic colour changing umbrella. Every time you go out in the rain the design changes into colour. So much fun! Watch as the white areas magically change colour in the rain, as it dries out they go back to white and it happens all over again when the rain comes back. Featuring our cool Dino design - spot lots of different dinosaur friends come to life in the rain. Complete with a handy velcro tie to keep neatly closed when not in use. Suitable for ages 3+. Changes colour in the rain. Velcro tie to keep it neatly stored. Umbrella Size: 66 x 60cm.

item.g:title: Dinosaur Magic Water Colour-In Cards
item.g:description: Encouraging learning through fun, these dinosaur themed water cards teach you to write your numbers 1-10 and count. There are also some words to colour in for those ready for the next level! Packed nice and neatly together this will easily fit in a travel bag so great for on the go to keep little ones entertained. Dimensions 7.4 x 7 x 0.7". Suitable for children 3+.

item.g:title: Emerald Chunky Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our cord collection has been a long-time favourite of our customers so this season we are expanding the range with BRAND NEW chunky cords in all our best selling seasonal colours. They are everything you love about our classic cords... with a twist! 

Our super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!
 


Retail prices 2x listed wholesale prices. All prices quoted include local taxes & duties.

item.g:title: Enchanted Magnetic Play Scenes
item.g:description: Our Magnetic Play Scenes are so much fun! Featuring two picture story interchangeable backdrops, choose from either a magical swan lake or a grand theatre stage. Hours of enjoyment, creativity and exploration can be had creating masterpieces with over 50 magnetic pieces including ballerinas, dancers, swans in teacups and forest friends. Fold down the box lid and store the magnetic pieces in the handy drawer for easy storage, perfect for at home or on the go! Decorative keepsake box which doubles as part of the game. Includes 2 interchangeable theme backdrops. Over 50 magnetic play pieces. Handy pull out drawer to store the pieces. Encourages imaginative play. Recommended age: 3+. Box size: 22 x 30cm.

item.g:title: Fairy Unicorn Water Pen and Cards
item.g:description: Our magic water cards make the most exciting gift and can be used over and over again. Simply fill the pen with water and colour in the pictures or follow the outlines to reveal designs, letters and numbers which then slowly disappear. Supplied in a strong resusable carry case.

item.g:description:

They are the perfect accessory to our dungaree, shorts and dress collection and can be mixed and matched with any of our winter colours.

item.g:title: Jungle Memory Match
item.g:description: There’s so much fun to be had with our Memory Match Games! 36 super cards stacked up in a lovely reusable case. These gorgeous cards are illustrated in our fantastic Jungle design featuring sloths, tigers, giraffes and much more. With fabulous foiled details and lovely patterns, you’ll find 18 matching picture pairs in this perfect pick up gift! With multiple ways to play, you can either deal out the cards between players and take it in turns to lay down your cards facing up and SNAP! when it’s a marvellous match. Alternatively, you can lay all the cards facing down and take it in turns to turn two over at a time to find a perfect pair! Improves cognitive skills, hand/eye coordination and memory. Perfect for taking out and about. Can be played alone or with friends. Includes 18 matching picture pairs. Recommended age: 2+. Box size: 8 x 8 x 16.2cm / Card size: 7 x 7cm.

item.g:title: RX copy for B2B Hera Co-sleep Crib
item.g:description:
Product Information:

Sleep is of the essence for us at Gaia Baby. With the Hera Crib, it’s built in. 

In this beautifully crafted real wood crib, with your baby close and secure, you will find:

✓ Easy and simple settings & adjustments to customize your Hera crib so that you and your baby sleep better, for longer.    
✓ The Hera Co-Sleep Crib is specially designed to provide a safe, secure, and comfortable nights’ sleep for you and your baby.
✓ Safety certified to the highest global standards, this beautifully crafted crib is made from natural Ash, sustainably grown in the USA.
✓ Its gently curved ends in natural tones highlight the real grain of this eco-friendly wood.
✓ With stunning A-frame accents, its generous size makes it the perfect choice for a baby's first sleep space. 

The Hera Crib is part of the Hera Family Collection with the choice of coordinating Cot / Dresser / Wardrobe, Changing Station & accessories.















About Gaia Baby: 'From our Family to yours.'


Gaia Baby was founded by Karl & Joanne, supported by their respective partners, Sarah & Peter. Their journey as parents to 7 kids, combined with experience of large-scale and start up businesses in the nursery industry, inspired them to create Gaia Baby.
Where possible, we make Gaia Baby products from renewable resources and we aim to ensure our products are recyclable and biodegradable. We work only with suppliers and producers who manufacture in an ethical way. We also test all our products to the highest recognised and trusted global standards.
Just 2 years on, Gaia Baby is sold in many of the UK & Ireland’s top baby stores and is also available through our family of distribution partners in the Middle East, Australia and Europe.

At Gaia Baby we can truly say “from our family to yours”.

item.g:title: RX copy for B2C Hera Co-sleep Crib (base)
item.g:description:

In this beautifully crafted real wood crib, with your baby close and secure, you will find easy and simple settings & adjustments to customize your Hera crib so that you and your baby sleep better, for longer.    

The Hera Co-Sleep Crib is specially designed to provide a safe, secure, and comfortable nights’ sleep for you and your baby. Safety certified to the highest global standards, this beautifully crafted crib is made from natural Ash, sustainably grown in the USA. Its gently curved ends in natural tones highlight the real grain of this eco-friendly wood. With stunning A-frame accents, its generous size makes it the perfect choice for a baby's first sleep space. 

The Hera Crib is part of the Hera Family Collection with the choice of coordinating Cot / Dresser / Wardrobe, Changing Station & accessories.

item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Available to ship in 4 weeks from date of purchase
    2. Kerbside delivery only
    3. Products listed in our outlet are unused/new but may have cosmetic damage e.g., paint/fabric imperfections/marks/colour variations. The packaging may also be imperfect. Don't miss your chance to grab a bargain!
    4. Products purchased from the Outlet are not eligible for returns / warranty / refunds. This does not affect your statutory rights. Unfortunately, we are unable to offer Partial.ly payment plans on our Outlet pieces.
    5. Grows with your child from birth - 5 years (included Co-Sleeping Crib - Baby Cot - Toddler Bed - First Bed).
    6. Fully certified Co-Sleeping Crib suitable from birth up to 6mths.
    7. 6 possible mattress height adjustments from 66cm (max) to 48cm.
    8. Slatted sides & base ensure maximum ventilation.
    9. Surface sleeping area 70x56cm.
    10. Included: Co-sleeping Crib mattress with 'Cool-Plus' technology.
    11. Option to extend First Bed from 140cm to 165cm, suitable up to 10yrs with our Junior Bed Extension Kit (sold separately).
    12. Tested to the highest standards and fully certified to EN716 (Cot), EN1130 (Crib) & BS8509 (First bed), ASTM F406/ASTM F1821& AS/NZS2172.

  • The Gaia Serena Complete Sleep+/Co-Sleep includes all the parts you need for use your crib from birth to 5 years old. Starting as a Co-Sleeping Crib which is certified to the highest global standards for co-sleeping and made from 100% FSC certified birch wood & natural undyed fabrics. The slatted sides and base and a fully breathable side mesh panel ensures maximum ventilation and breathability for your baby.

    Featuring 6 possible mattress height adjustments from 66cm (box-spring or divan style parents bed) to 48cm (Ikea style beds) allow for a perfect fit.

    Your Gaia Serena Complete Sleep+/Co-Sleep comes with a Co-sleeping Crib mattress with 'Cool-Plus' technology, anti-allergy cover with Actipro natural treatment.

    Convert your Crib to full size Baby Cot (70 x 140cm) once baby starts to pull up (parts included). As baby becomes an inquisitive toddler, make the simple transition to a Toddler Bed (optional Toddler Rail sold separately). For the first steps towards independent sleeping, transition smoothly to the 'First Bed' up to 5 years.

    Good to know: You can extend the life of your Complete Sleep even further with the Junior Bed Extension Kit (sold separately) for kids up to 10 years. Certified to the highest global safety standards. Gaia Baby products are sustainably sourced, ethically manufactured and made to last the test of time. All in all, simply beautiful parenting!

  • Assembled Dimensions: Crib Mode = L:54.7cm W:70cm H:101cm.
    Cot / Toddler Bed = L:140cm W:70cm H:101cm.
    First Bed = L:140cm W:70cm H:61cm

item.g:description:

    6. Use as a compact Mini Cot from newborn-2years.

    9. Dual mattress height adjustment: high position- allows easier access to newborn.
    10. Option to extend to 165cm/ up to 10yrs (Junior Bed Extension Kit sold separately).
    11. Tested to the highest standards and fully certified to EN716 (Cot)/ EN1130 (crib) & BS8509 (child bed)/ ASTM F406/ASTM F1821& AS/NZS2172.

  • The Gaia Baby Complete Sleep+/Mini offers a compact but substantial first sleep place for baby that is beautifully designed, made from natural birch wood and uniquely converts to use as a full size cot.

    Made from sustainably sourced natural birch wood, the Gaia Baby Complete Sleep+/Mini features soft contours and smooth flowing lines. Used from birth as a Mini Cot, with mattress in the upper position from Newborn; adjust the height to lower level once baby starts to pull up (up to 2 years). 

    As baby grows, expand to the full size Baby Cot. As baby becomes an inquisitive toddler, gently transition to Toddler Bed (optional Toddler Rail sold separately). For the first steps towards independent sleeping, transition smoothly to First Bed.

    Good to know: You can also extend the life of your Complete Sleep with the Junior Bed extension Kit (sold separately) for kids up to 10 years.

item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Ships within 1 week of purchase
    2. Premium quality pocket sprung mattress featuring soft quilted fabric
    3. Individual high tensile springs offer responsive comfort and support
    4. Breathable and encourages a natural airflow to maintain comfortable temperature while sleeping
    5. Features a water-resistant Kidtech reverse side
    6. Zip-off cover, quick drying and machine washable at 40°. Wipeable and water resistant to help keep your mattress clean and dry at all times
    7. Fully certified to BS EN 16890, BS 7177:2008+A1:2011 & SI 316/1995
    8. Suitable for use in Maxi Cot/Toddler Bed/First Bed modes

  • The Serena Cot Bed Mattress is a comfortable pocket-sprung option for your Serena Complete Sleep cot. Featuring a soft quilted fabric, the mattress is extremely breathable and encourages a natural airflow to help maintain a comfortable sleeping climate for your baby.

    It's individual high tensile pocket springs encapsulated in nursery grade foam provide responsive comfort and optimal body support so your little one can sleep easy. The adaptive springs react to your baby’s movement and growth; providing targeted support for the perfect level of comfort. 

    Machine washable at 40°, wipeable, water-resistant & certified latest BS & EN safety standards.

item.g:title: Serena Junior Bed Extension Mattress
item.g:description:
• Features
  • Description
  • Specifications
    1. Ships within 1 week of purchase
    2. Convert your Serena Complete Sleep Mattress to a Junior bed mattress (66cm x 161cm) for children up to 10 years with this extension piece.
    3. Premium quality nursery grade foam mattress extension piece
    4. Features ‘Cool-Plus’ technology to help control baby’s body temperature, reducing the risk of overheating.
    5. Fully breathable, zipped removable cover is machine washable at 60° C.
    6. Anti-allergy cover with Actipro natural treatment- 100% natural and very effective solution for combatting allergens, e.g. house dust mite. Also eliminates undesirable odours and enhances a healthy sleep environment.
    7. Zip-off cover, quick drying and machine washable at 60 degrees to kill dust mites. Wipeable waterproof layer helps keep your mattress clean and dry at all times.
    8. PVC outer cover means core is 100% waterproof.
    9. Tested to the highest standards and fully certified to BS1877

  • The Gaia Baby Junior Bed Extension Mattress is designed to extend your Complete Sleep mattress from for kids up to 10yrs. Purchased with the Junior Bed Extension Kit, this premium nursery grade foam mattress comes complete with its own individual zip cover washable at 60° C.

    Featuring Cool Plus Technology for breathability and temperature control, plus Actipro Anti Allergy treatment, the Gaia Baby Junior Bed Extension Mattress is completely waterproof and can be used with or without the zipped cover. Made in the UK, and tested to the highest EN safety standards.

  • Dimensions: L:25cm W:66cm H:10cm

    Product Weight: 2.4kg

    Warranty: 1 year warranty as standard.

    For use with: Gaia Serena Junior Bed and Serena Complete Sleep Mattress (sold separately)

item.g:title: Magnetic Fun & Games Tin - Enchanted
item.g:description: 1 tin... 4 games… a great gift and perfect for taking out and about. All of the scenes and pieces are magnetic so easy to keep contained. There is Bunnies & Ladders, Tic Tac Toe, Wordsearch and a Magnetic Scene with pop out pieces. Themed around Ballet and Swan Lake. The set also includes a bag to store all of the bits and pieces and a ‘dry wipe’ pen for the wordsearch. Great fun for playing alone or with friends and family. Suitable for age 3+.

item.g:title: Maxi Short Sleeve Tee - White
item.g:description:
NEW!

The Maxi Short Sleeve Tee is a stylish and timeless wardrobe staple. Crafted from a lightweight and breathable fabric, the grandad top design offers a relaxed fit with the classic collar and cuff details. A wardrobe must-have, this piece is sure to never go out of style.

Dotty Dungarees tops are the perfect accessory to our overalls, dresses and shorts and our customers increasingly buy an outfit:

- super soft, sustainably sourced cotton
- classic cuts that never go out of style
- attention to detail (bespoke buttons)
- easy to put on/take off

Dotty Dungarees is a female founded brand, based in the UK, and stocked all over the world.

item.g:title: Mint Chunky Cord Dungarees
item.g:description:
NEW!

Our cord collection has been a long-time favourite of our customers so this season we are expanding the range with BRAND NEW chunky cords in all our best selling seasonal colours. They are everything you love about our classic cords... with a twist! 

Our super soft corduroy dungarees have become a staple in every little wardrobe. They come with Dotty details including adjustable straps and turn-ups to make them truly last a full year, signature 100% cotton jersey lining, bespoke buttons and zip access for quick nappy changes (up to age 18-24m). 

Our cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to generous turn-ups and adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend!
 


Retail prices 2x listed wholesale prices. All prices quoted include local taxes & duties.

item.g:title: Navy Corduroy Dress
item.g:description:
Our best-selling winter cord dresses are back, in a range of seasonal colours. Made from the softest needlepoint cord with our signature 100% cotton jersey lining and with matching knickers, they are the perfect winter choice for blustery outdoor adventures as well as cosy fireside days.

Our cord is largely made of cotton, with a small amount of essential stretch (elastane) which makes it super comfortable for children of all ages and also means our clothes can withstand whatever children throw at them! Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do which is why we have designed clothes that, thanks to adjustable straps, really do last a full year and can be passed down to siblings and friends. Their classic cut and beautiful fabrics mean they stand the test of time and trend.

Dresses are available in Old Rose Pink, Ochre and Bright Red, as well as Chunky Cord - Robin.


Retail prices 2x listed wholesale prices. All prices quoted include local taxes & duties.

item.g:description:
NEW!!

These faded denim dungarees perfectly capture that nostalgic '90s look, while providing superior comfort. Crafted from 100% cotton, they're super soft and designed with a vintage feel for a look that stands the test of time.

As always, they have all the unique Dotty features: 

- lined in 100% combed cotton poplin

item.g:title: Rainbow Fairy Magnetic Play Scenes
item.g:description: Check out our magnetic play scenes, which feature two picture story interchangeable backdrops either at the fairground or in the magical woods. Hours of fun can be had creating masterpieces with over 50 magnetic pieces. Fold down the box lid and store the magnetic pieces in the handy drawer for easy storage, perfect for at home or on the go!.

item.g:title: Rainbow Fairy Playbox
item.g:description: The rainbow fairy playbox comes complete with a cotton bag holding 18 amazing wooden, double sided pieces. There are fairies, flying unicorns, roller blading llamas, hula dancing bears and so much more. The house opens up to reveal 6 gorgeous rooms, all hand illustrated. There's a bathroom, a bedroom, a kitchen, a living room. Its so much fun and so colourful. Place your characters around the house and let your imagination run wild. It is fully portable with a cool carry handle should you want to show this off and take to friends to play together. Dimensions 11.8 x 9 x 8.7". Suitable for 3+

item.g:title: Rainbow Fairy Tin Tea Set is Semi Circle Foiled Case
item.g:description: One of our best selling products, children can't get enough of our super cute tin tea sets! Supplied in a reusable-foiled rainbow shaped carry case this 10-piece tea set includes: 2 teacups and saucers, 2 spoons, 2 plates and a lidded teapot.

item.g:title: Rainbow Unicorn 12pc Shaped Jigsaw with Shaped Box
item.g:description: Our 12 piece puzzles make a great gift, packed into a fantastic shaped box with foiled details. It features 12 large, chunky shaped pieces with foiled elements.

item.g:title: Rainbow Woodland jewelry Box - Music: Over the Rainbow)
item.g:description: Our musical jewelry boxes are one of our best selling products! With a pretty pearl handle and a drawer for extra storage space making this box a guaranteed best seller. Wind up the key at the back, open the lid and the fairy twirls to the beautiful music "over the rainbow".

item.g:title: Random Variables Shorts - Blue
item.g:description:
NEW!

The Random Variables Shorts in Blue feature a fun graphic print and are made of a super soft material for ultimate comfort. Perfect for any active lifestyle, these shorts are a must-have for summertime.


Brand new for SS23, this unisex print is both bright and fun. As always, our shorts have all the unique Dotty features:
 
- bespoke bumble bee brass buttons
- adjustable straps so they can be worn a full year, and then passed down to siblings/friends
- super soft, durable, quality fabrics
- perfect from crawling to climbing trees
- matches any Dotty Dungarees top for the perfect adventure outfit
- fully machine washable
- classic unisex cuts with generous sizing
- retro, vintage, nostalgic
 
Dotty Dungarees is a female founded brand, based in the UK, and stocked all over the world. The Dotty customer buys full price and comes back season after season. Stockists don't have the rush to discount at the end of the season as dungarees are fundamentally sustainable - the opposite of fast fashion. They stand the test of time and trend.

item.g:title: Rocket 12pc Shaped Jigsaw with Shaped Box
item.g:description: Our 12 piece puzzles make a great gift, packed into a fantastic shaped box with foiled details. It features 12 large, chunky shaped pieces with foiled elements.

item.g:title: Safari Park 60pc Giant Floor Puzzle with Pop Out Pieces
item.g:description: This shaped, 60 piece Safari Park Jigsaw with Pop Out Pieces is sure to keep little hands busy, resulting in hours of concentration and imaginative play in our super cool safari park scene. Once your fabulous floor puzzle is complete you’re ready to… POP! Out your 16 pop up characters and slide them into their stands. Once standing, your jungle animals, tourists, safari explorers (and more) are ready to explore the diverse safari park scene. What will you get up to on your safari stay? Once playtime’s finished, the puzzle and pop out pieces can be neatly packed away inside its decorative box. Suitable for ages 5+. Contains 60 high quality big puzzle pieces. Pop out play sheets include 16 gorgeous, fun, pop out play pieces to build. Fantastic fun shaped puzzle. Improves problem solving skills. Handy carry box to store all of the pieces. Box dimensions: 30 x 16.5 x 10.5cm. Complete puzzle: 142 x 28cm.

item.g:title: Shark 12pc Shaped Jigsaw with Shaped Box
item.g:description: Our 12 piece puzzles make a great gift, packed into a fantastic shaped box with foiled details. It features 12 large, chunky shaped pieces with foiled elements.

item.g:title: Space Magnetic Fun and Games Compendium
item.g:description: Our portable magnetic fun & games tins are perfect for on the move each tin features 4 games: snakes & ladders, tic tac toe, a magnetic scene to decorate and a word search! Also includes dice, a wipeable pen and bag to store all your pop out magnetic pieces.

item.g:title: Space Magnetic Play Scenes
item.g:description: Check out our magnetic play scenes, which feature two picture story interchangeable backdrops either at the fairground or in the magical woods. Hours of fun can be had creating masterpieces with over 50 magnetic pieces. Fold down the box lid and store the magnetic pieces in the handy drawer for easy storage, perfect for at home or on the go!.

item.g:title: The Jack Tee - Green
item.g:description:
The Jack Tee is crafted with 100% cotton for ultimate comfort and breathability. It's soft touch and bright hue bring a classic, timeless look. A wardrobe essential to enjoy for years to come.

They are available in beautiful pastel colours to complement our pastel palette, mint, pink, lilac and pale blue plus primary red, green and yellow.

These super soft t-shirts are 95% cotton, 5% elastane making them quick and easy to slip over little heads. As always, they are machine washable up to 30 degrees.

item.g:title: Tonal Colourblock Dungarees - Blue
item.g:description:
NEW!!

Our Tonal Colourblock Dungarees are the perfect way to enjoy sunny beach days. These lightweight 100% cotton dungarees feature all the pinks, creating a look that’s both eye-catching and classic. Perfect to stay cool in summertime.

As always, they have all the unique Dotty features:

- 100% cotton jersey lining
- bespoke bumble bee brass buttons
- zip opening between the legs up to 18-24m for the fastest nappy changes
- adjustable straps so they can be worn a full year, and then passed down to siblings/friends

- fully machine washable

item.g:title: New Test Product
item.g:description: Cool, comfy and super practical baby sleepwear. Zip-up Unisex baby grow for quick and easy changing. YKK Zip fastening means no more wrestling with all those poppers! Our signature Just Imagine print brings the colour and imagination to the soft organic cotton off white base. “Just Imagine” slogans on the soles of the feet so you know when bedtime has arrived! This style is guaranteed to keep little wrigglers cosy and comfy and keep changing as easy as can be!
